   9774  f269		       b0 19		      bcs	sfxsoundloop	; AUDV0>$0F means the sound is looped while priority is active
   9775  f26b
   9776  f26b		       05 d9		      ora	inttemp2
   9777  f26d		       05 d8		      ora	inttemp1	; check if F|C|V=0
   9778  f26f		       f0 23		      beq	zerosfx	; if so, we're at the end of the sound.
   9779  f271
   9780  f271				   advancesfxpointer
   9781  f271							; advance the pointer to the next sound chunk
   9782  f271		       c8		      iny
   9783  f272		       84 da		      sty	inttemp3
   9784  f274		       18		      clc
   9785  f275		       b5 4e		      lda	sfx1pointlo,x
   9786  f277		       65 da		      adc	inttemp3
   9787  f279		       95 4e		      sta	sfx1pointlo,x
   9788  f27b		       b5 50		      lda	sfx1pointhi,x
   9789  f27d		       69 00		      adc	#0
   9790  f27f		       95 50		      sta	sfx1pointhi,x
   9791  f281		       4c 05 f2 	      jmp	servicesfxchannelsloop
   9792  f284
   9793  f284				   sfxsoundloop
   9794  f284		       48		      pha
   9795  f285		       b5 52		      lda	sfx1priority,x
   9796  f287		       d0 04		      bne	sfxsoundloop_carryon
   9797  f289		       68		      pla		; fix the stack before we go
   9798  f28a		       4c 71 f2 	      jmp	advancesfxpointer
   9799  f28d				   sfxsoundloop_carryon
   9800  f28d		       68		      pla
   9801  f28e		       29 f0		      and	#$F0
   9802  f290		       4a		      lsr
   9803  f291		       4a		      lsr
   9804  f292		       4a		      lsr
   9805  f293		       4a		      lsr
   9806  f294
   9807  f294				   zerosfx
   9808  f294		       95 4e		      sta	sfx1pointlo,x
   9809  f296		       95 50		      sta	sfx1pointhi,x
   9810  f298		       95 52		      sta	sfx1priority,x
   9811  f29a		       4c 05 f2 	      jmp	servicesfxchannelsloop
   9812  f29d
   9813  f29d
   9814  f29d				   schedulesfx
   9815  f29d							; called with sfxinstrumentlo=<data sfxinstrumenthi=>data sfxpitchoffset=pitch-offset sfxnoteindex=note index
   9816  f29d		       a0 00		      ldy	#0
   9817  f29f				  -	      ifconst	pokeysupport
   9818  f29f				  -	      lda	sfxinstrumenthi
   9819  f29f				  -	      beq	scheduletiasfx	; drums have undefined instrument
   9820  f29f				  -	      lda	(sfxinstrumentlo),y
   9821  f29f				  -	      cmp	#$20	; POKEY?
   9822  f29f				  -	      bne	scheduletiasfx
   9823  f29f				  -	      jmp	schedulepokeysfx
   9824  f29f					      endif
   9825  f29f				   scheduletiasfx
   9826  f29f							;cmp #$10 ; TIA?
   9827  f29f							;beq continuescheduletiasfx
   9828  f29f							; rts ; unhandled!!!
   9829  f29f				   continuescheduletiasfx
   9830  f29f					      ifnconst	TIASFXMONO
   9831  f29f		       a5 50		      lda	sfx1pointhi
   9832  f2a1		       f0 15		      beq	schedulesfx1	;if channel 1 is idle, use it
   9833  f2a3		       a5 51		      lda	sfx2pointhi
   9834  f2a5		       f0 15		      beq	schedulesfx2	;if channel 2 is idle, use it
   9835  f2a7							; Both channels are scheduled.
   9836  f2a7		       a5 e1		      lda	sfxinstrumenthi
   9837  f2a9		       f0 06		      beq	skipscheduledrums
   9838  f2ab		       a0 01		      ldy	#1
   9839  f2ad		       b1 e0		      lda	(sfxinstrumentlo),y
   9840  f2af		       d0 01		      bne	interruptsfx
   9841  f2b1				   skipscheduledrums
   9842  f2b1		       60		      rts		; the new sound has 0 priority and both channels are busy. Skip playing it.
   9843  f2b2				   interruptsfx
   9844  f2b2							;Compare which active sound has a lower priority. We'll interrupt the lower one.
   9845  f2b2		       a5 52		      lda	sfx1priority
   9846  f2b4		       c5 53		      cmp	sfx2priority
   9847  f2b6		       b0 04		      bcs	schedulesfx2
   9848  f2b8					      endif		; !TIASFXMONO
   9849  f2b8
   9850  f2b8				   schedulesfx1
   9851  f2b8		       a2 00		      ldx	#0	; channel 1
   9852  f2ba					      ifnconst	TIASFXMONO
   9853  f2ba		       f0 02		      beq	skipschedulesfx2
   9854  f2bc				   schedulesfx2
   9855  f2bc		       a2 01		      ldx	#1	; channel 2
   9856  f2be				   skipschedulesfx2
   9857  f2be					      endif		; !TIASFXMONO
   9858  f2be
   9859  f2be				  -	      ifconst	MUSICTRACKER
   9860  f2be				  -	      lda	sfxnoteindex
   9861  f2be				  -	      bpl	skipdrumkitoverride
   9862  f2be				  -	      and	#$7F	; subtract 128
   9863  f2be				  -	      sec
   9864  f2be				  -	      sbc	#4	; drums start at 132, i.e. octave 10
   9865  f2be				  -	      asl
   9866  f2be				  -	      tay
   9867  f2be				  -	      lda	tiadrumkitdefinition,y
   9868  f2be				  -	      sta	sfxinstrumentlo
   9869  f2be				  -	      iny
   9870  f2be				  -	      lda	tiadrumkitdefinition,y
   9871  f2be				  -	      sta	sfxinstrumenthi
   9872  f2be				  -	      lda	#0
   9873  f2be				  -	      sta	sfxnoteindex	; and tell the driver it's a non-pitched instrument
   9874  f2be				  -skipdrumkitoverride
   9875  f2be					      endif		; MUSICTRACKER
   9876  f2be		       a0 01		      ldy	#1	; get priority and sound-resolution (in frames)
   9877  f2c0		       b1 e0		      lda	(sfxinstrumentlo),y
   9878  f2c2		       95 52		      sta	sfx1priority,x
   9879  f2c4		       c8		      iny
   9880  f2c5		       b1 e0		      lda	(sfxinstrumentlo),y
   9881  f2c7		       95 56		      sta	sfx1frames,x
   9882  f2c9		       a5 e0		      lda	sfxinstrumentlo
   9883  f2cb		       18		      clc
   9884  f2cc		       69 03		      adc	#3
   9885  f2ce		       95 4e		      sta	sfx1pointlo,x
   9886  f2d0		       a5 e1		      lda	sfxinstrumenthi
   9887  f2d2		       69 00		      adc	#0
   9888  f2d4		       95 50		      sta	sfx1pointhi,x
   9889  f2d6		       a5 e2		      lda	sfxpitchoffset
   9890  f2d8		       95 54		      sta	sfx1poffset,x
   9891  f2da		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   9892  f2dc		       95 58		      sta	sfx1tick,x
   9893  f2de		       a5 e3		      lda	sfxnoteindex
   9894  f2e0		       95 cd		      sta	sfx1notedata,x
   9895  f2e2		       60		      rts
   9896  f2e3
   9897  f2e3				   plotsprite
   9898  f2e3					      ifnconst	NODRAWWAIT
   9899  f2e3				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   9900  f2e3				  -	      lda	doublebufferstate
   9901  f2e3				  -	      bne	skipplotspritewait
   9902  f2e3					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   9903  f2e3				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   9904  f2e3				  -	      lda	#$41
   9905  f2e3				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   9906  f2e3					      endif
   9907  f2e3				   plotspritewait
   9908  f2e3		       a5 4d		      lda	visibleover
   9909  f2e5		       d0 fc		      bne	plotspritewait
   9910  f2e7				   skipplotspritewait
   9911  f2e7				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   9912  f2e7				  -	      lda	#$0
   9913  f2e7				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   9914  f2e7					      endif
   9915  f2e7					      endif
   9916  f2e7
   9917  f2e7							;arguments:
   9918  f2e7							; temp1=lo graphicdata
   9919  f2e7							; temp2=hi graphicdata
   9920  f2e7							; temp3=palette | width byte
   9921  f2e7							; temp4=x
   9922  f2e7							; temp5=y
   9923  f2e7							; temp6=mode
   9924  f2e7		       a5 46		      lda	temp5	;Y position
   9925  f2e9		       4a		      lsr		; 2 - Divide by 8 or 16
   9926  f2ea		       4a		      lsr		; 2
   9927  f2eb		       4a		      lsr		; 2
   9928  f2ec					      if	WZONEHEIGHT = 16
   9929  f2ec		       4a		      lsr		; 2
   9930  f2ed					      endif
   9931  f2ed
   9932  f2ed		       aa		      tax
   9933  f2ee
   9934  f2ee					      ifnconst	NOLIMITCHECKING
   9935  f2ee
   9936  f2ee							; the next block allows for vertical masking, and ensures we don't overwrite non-DL memory
   9937  f2ee
   9938  f2ee		       c9 0c		      cmp	#WZONECOUNT
   9939  f2f0
   9940  f2f0		       90 0a		      bcc	continueplotsprite1	; the sprite is fully on-screen, so carry on...
   9941  f2f2							; otherwise, check to see if the bottom half is in zone 0...
   9942  f2f2
   9943  f2f2					      if	WZONEHEIGHT = 16
   9944  f2f2		       c9 0f		      cmp	#15
   9945  f2f4				  -	      else
   9946  f2f4				  -	      cmp	#31
   9947  f2f4					      endif
   9948  f2f4
   9949  f2f4		       d0 05		      bne	exitplotsprite1
   9950  f2f6		       a2 00		      ldx	#0
   9951  f2f8		       4c 31 f3 	      jmp	continueplotsprite2
   9952  f2fb				   exitplotsprite1
   9953  f2fb		       60		      rts
   9954  f2fc
   9955  f2fc				   continueplotsprite1
   9956  f2fc					      endif
   9957  f2fc
   9958  f2fc				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   9959  f2fc				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
   9960  f2fc				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
   9961  f2fc					      else		; !VSCROLL
   9962  f2fc		       bd 75 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to DL that this sprite starts in
   9963  f2ff					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   9964  f2ff				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   9965  f2ff				  -	      clc
   9966  f2ff				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   9967  f2ff					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   9968  f2ff		       85 63		      sta	dlpnt
   9969  f301				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   9970  f301				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
   9971  f301					      else		; !VSCROLL
   9972  f301		       bd 69 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   9973  f304					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   9974  f304				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   9975  f304				  -	      adc	#0
   9976  f304					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   9977  f304		       85 64		      sta	dlpnt+1
   9978  f306
   9979  f306							;Create DL entry for upper part of sprite
   9980  f306
   9981  f306		       b4 65		      ldy	dlend,x	;Get the index to the end of this DL
   9982  f308
   9983  f308				  -	      ifconst	CHECKOVERWRITE
   9984  f308				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   9985  f308				  -	      beq	checkcontinueplotsprite2
   9986  f308				  -continueplotsprite1a
   9987  f308					      endif
   9988  f308
   9989  f308		       a5 42		      lda	temp1	; graphic data, lo byte
   9990  f30a		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;Low byte of data address
   9991  f30c
   9992  f30c					      ifnconst	ATOMICSPRITEUPDATE
   9993  f30c		       c8		      iny
   9994  f30d		       a5 47		      lda	temp6
   9995  f30f		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   9996  f311				  -	      else
   9997  f311				  -	      iny
   9998  f311				  -	      sty	temp8
   9999  f311					      endif
  10000  f311
  10001  f311		       c8		      iny
  10002  f312
  10003  f312		       a5 46		      lda	temp5	;Y position
  10004  f314		       29 0f		      and	#(WZONEHEIGHT - 1)
  10005  f316		       c9 01		      cmp	#1	; clear carry if our sprite is just in this zone
  10006  f318		       05 43		      ora	temp2	; graphic data, hi byte
  10007  f31a		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
  10008  f31c
  10009  f31c		       c8		      iny
  10010  f31d		       a5 44		      lda	temp3	;palette|width
  10011  f31f		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
  10012  f321
  10013  f321		       c8		      iny
  10014  f322		       a5 45		      lda	temp4	;Horizontal position
  10015  f324		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
  10016  f326
  10017  f326		       c8		      iny
  10018  f327		       94 65		      sty	dlend,x
  10019  f329
  10020  f329				  -	      ifconst	ALWAYSTERMINATE
  10021  f329				  -	      iny
  10022  f329				  -	      lda	#0
  10023  f329				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
  10024  f329					      endif
  10025  f329
  10026  f329				  -	      ifconst	ATOMICSPRITEUPDATE
  10027  f329				  -	      ldy	temp8
  10028  f329				  -	      lda	temp6
  10029  f329				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
  10030  f329					      endif
  10031  f329
  10032  f329				   checkcontinueplotsprite2
  10033  f329
  10034  f329		       90 33		      bcc	doneSPDL	;branch if the sprite was fully in the last zone
  10035  f32b
  10036  f32b							;Create DL entry for lower part of sprite
  10037  f32b
  10038  f32b		       e8		      inx		;Next region
  10039  f32c
  10040  f32c					      ifnconst	NOLIMITCHECKING
  10041  f32c		       e0 0c		      cpx	#WZONECOUNT
  10042  f32e
  10043  f32e		       90 01		      bcc	continueplotsprite2	; the second half of the sprite is fully on-screen, so carry on...
  10044  f330		       60		      rts
  10045  f331				   continueplotsprite2
  10046  f331					      endif
  10047  f331
  10048  f331				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
  10049  f331				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
  10050  f331				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
  10051  f331					      else		; !VSCROLL
  10052  f331		       bd 75 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to next DL
  10053  f334					      endif		; !VSCROLL
  10054  f334				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10055  f334				  -	      clc
  10056  f334				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
  10057  f334					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10058  f334		       85 63		      sta	dlpnt
  10059  f336				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
  10060  f336				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
  10061  f336					      else		; !VSCROLL
  10062  f336		       bd 69 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
  10063  f339					      endif		; !VSCROLL
  10064  f339				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10065  f339				  -	      adc	#0
  10066  f339					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10067  f339		       85 64		      sta	dlpnt+1
  10068  f33b		       b4 65		      ldy	dlend,x	;Get the index to the end of this DL
  10069  f33d
  10070  f33d				  -	      ifconst	CHECKOVERWRITE
  10071  f33d				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
  10072  f33d				  -	      bne	continueplotsprite2a
  10073  f33d				  -	      rts
  10074  f33d				  -continueplotsprite2a
  10075  f33d					      endif
  10076  f33d
  10077  f33d		       a5 42		      lda	temp1	; graphic data, lo byte
  10078  f33f		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
  10079  f341
  10080  f341					      ifnconst	ATOMICSPRITEUPDATE
  10081  f341		       c8		      iny
  10082  f342		       a5 47		      lda	temp6
  10083  f344		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
  10084  f346				  -	      else
  10085  f346				  -	      iny
  10086  f346				  -	      sty	temp8
  10087  f346					      endif
  10088  f346
  10089  f346		       c8		      iny
  10090  f347
  10091  f347		       a5 46		      lda	temp5	;Y position
  10092  f349		       0b 0f		      anc	#(WZONEHEIGHT - 1)	; undocumented. A=A&IMM, then move bit 7 into carry
  10093  f34b		       05 43		      ora	temp2	; graphic data, hi byte
  10094  f34d		       e9 0f		      sbc	#(WZONEHEIGHT-1)	; start at the DMA hole. -1 because carry is clear
  10095  f34f		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
  10096  f351
  10097  f351		       c8		      iny
  10098  f352
  10099  f352		       a5 44		      lda	temp3	;palette|width
  10100  f354		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
  10101  f356

  10103  f357

  10105  f359		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
  10106  f35b

  10108  f35c		       94 65		      sty	dlend,x
  10109  f35e
  10110  f35e				  -	      ifconst	ALWAYSTERMINATE
  10111  f35e				  -	      iny

  10113  f35e				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
  10114  f35e					      endif
  10115  f35e
  10116  f35e				  -	      ifconst	ATOMICSPRITEUPDATE
  10117  f35e				  -	      ldy	temp8
  10118  f35e				  -	      lda	temp6
  10119  f35e				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
  10120  f35e					      endif
  10121  f35e
  10122  f35e				   doneSPDL
  10123  f35e		       60		      rts
  10124  f35f
  10125  f35f				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
  10126  f35f				  -			; x3 table for fast DLL parsing
  10127  f35f				  -Xx3
  10128  f35f				  -	      .byte	0,3,6,9,12,15,18,21,24,27
  10129  f35f				  -	      .byte	30,33,36,39,42,45,48,51,54,57
  10130  f35f				  -	      .byte	60,63,66,69,72,75,78,81,84,87
  10131  f35f				  -maskscrollsprite
  10132  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,%11000000,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),0,160	; 5*2 + 32*3 = 106 cycles
  10133  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,1,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),160	; 4*2 + 31*3 = 101 cycles
  10134  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,1,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),160	; 4*2 + 31*3 = 101 cycles
  10135  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,1,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),160	; 4*2 + 31*3 = 101 cycles
  10136  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,%01000000,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),16,160	; 5*2 + 16*3 =  58 cycles
  10137  f35f				  -			; MAX	============ 467 cycles
  10138  f35f				  -			; MIN	============  59 cycles
  10139  f35f				  -maskscrollspriteend
  10140  f35f					      endif		; VSCROLL
  10141  f35f
  10142  f35f				   lockzonex
  10143  f35f				  -	      ifconst	ZONELOCKS
  10144  f35f				  -	      ldy	dlend,x
  10145  f35f				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
  10146  f35f				  -	      beq	lockzonexreturn	; the zone is either stuffed or locked. abort!
  10147  f35f				  -	      lda	DLPOINTL,x
  10148  f35f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10149  f35f				  -	      clc
  10150  f35f				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
  10151  f35f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10152  f35f				  -	      sta	dlpnt
  10153  f35f				  -	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
  10154  f35f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10155  f35f				  -	      adc	#0
  10156  f35f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10157  f35f				  -	      sta	dlpnt+1
  10158  f35f				  -	      iny
  10159  f35f				  -	      lda	#0
  10160  f35f				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
  10161  f35f				  -	      dey
  10162  f35f				  -	      tya
  10163  f35f				  -	      ldy	#(DLLASTOBJ-1)
  10164  f35f				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
  10165  f35f				  -	      iny
  10166  f35f				  -	      sty	dlend,x
  10167  f35f				  -lockzonexreturn
  10168  f35f				  -	      rts
  10169  f35f					      endif		; ZONELOCKS
  10170  f35f				   unlockzonex
  10171  f35f				  -	      ifconst	ZONELOCKS
  10172  f35f				  -	      ldy	dlend,x
  10173  f35f				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
  10174  f35f				  -	      bne	unlockzonexreturn	; if the zone isn't stuffed, it's not locked. abort!
  10175  f35f				  -	      lda	DLPOINTL,x
  10176  f35f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10177  f35f				  -	      clc
  10178  f35f				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
  10179  f35f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10180  f35f				  -	      sta	dlpnt
  10181  f35f				  -	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
  10182  f35f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10183  f35f				  -	      adc	#0
  10184  f35f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10185  f35f				  -	      sta	dlpnt+1
  10186  f35f				  -	      dey
  10187  f35f				  -	      lda	(dlpnt),y
  10188  f35f				  -	      tay
  10189  f35f				  -	      sty	dlend,x
  10190  f35f				  -unlockzonexreturn
  10191  f35f					      endif		; ZONELOCKS
  10192  f35f		       60		      rts
  10193  f360
  10194  f360				   plotcharloop
  10195  f360							; ** read from a data indirectly pointed to from temp8,temp9
  10196  f360							; ** format is: lo_data, hi_data, palette|width, x, y
  10197  f360							; ** format ends with lo_data | hi_data = 0
  10198  f360
  10199  f360				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10200  f360				  -	      lda	doublebufferstate
  10201  f360				  -	      bne	skipplotcharloopwait
  10202  f360					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10203  f360				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
  10204  f360				  -	      lda	#$61
  10205  f360				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
  10206  f360					      endif

  10209  f362		       d0 fc		      bne	plotcharloopwait
  10210  f364				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
  10211  f364				  -	      lda	#0
  10212  f364				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
  10213  f364					      endif
  10214  f364				   skipplotcharloopwait
  10215  f364				   plotcharlooploop
  10216  f364		       a0 00		      ldy	#0
  10217  f366		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
  10218  f368		       85 42		      sta	temp1
  10219  f36a		       c8		      iny
  10220  f36b		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
  10221  f36d		       85 43		      sta	temp2
  10222  f36f		       05 42		      ora	temp1
  10223  f371		       d0 01		      bne	plotcharloopcontinue
  10224  f373							;the pointer=0, so return
  10225  f373		       60		      rts
  10226  f374				   plotcharloopcontinue
  10227  f374		       c8		      iny
  10228  f375		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
  10229  f377		       85 44		      sta	temp3
  10230  f379		       c8		      iny
  10231  f37a		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
  10232  f37c		       85 45		      sta	temp4
  10233  f37e		       c8		      iny
  10234  f37f		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
  10235  f381							;sta temp5 ; not needed with our late entry.
  10236  f381		       20 9a f3 	      jsr	plotcharactersskipentry
  10237  f384		       a5 49		      lda	temp8
  10238  f386		       18		      clc
  10239  f387		       69 05		      adc	#5

  10244  f391		       4c 64 f3 	      jmp	plotcharlooploop
  10245  f394
  10246  f394				   plotcharacters
  10247  f394				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10248  f394				  -	      lda	doublebufferstate
  10249  f394				  -	      bne	skipplotcharacterswait
  10250  f394					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10251  f394				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
  10252  f394				  -	      lda	#$41
  10253  f394				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
  10254  f394					      endif
  10255  f394				   plotcharacterswait
  10256  f394		       a5 4d		      lda	visibleover
  10257  f396		       d0 fc		      bne	plotcharacterswait
  10258  f398				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
  10259  f398				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
  10260  f398					      endif
  10261  f398				   skipplotcharacterswait
  10262  f398							;arguments:
  10263  f398							; temp1=lo charactermap
  10264  f398							; temp2=hi charactermap
  10265  f398							; temp3=palette | width byte
  10266  f398							; temp4=x
  10267  f398							; temp5=y
  10268  f398
  10269  f398		       a5 46		      lda	temp5	;Y position
  10270  f39a
  10271  f39a				   plotcharactersskipentry
  10272  f39a
  10273  f39a							;ifconst ZONEHEIGHT
  10274  f39a							; if ZONEHEIGHT = 16
  10275  f39a							; and #$0F
  10276  f39a							; endif
  10277  f39a							; if ZONEHEIGHT = 8
  10278  f39a							; and #$1F
  10279  f39a							; endif
  10280  f39a							;else
  10281  f39a							; and #$0F
  10282  f39a							;endif
  10283  f39a
  10284  f39a		       aa		      tax
  10285  f39b
  10286  f39b				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
  10287  f39b				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
  10288  f39b				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
  10289  f39b					      else		; !VSCROLL
  10290  f39b		       bd 75 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to DL that the characters are in
  10291  f39e					      endif		; !VSCROLL
  10292  f39e				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10293  f39e				  -	      clc
  10294  f39e				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
  10295  f39e					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10296  f39e		       85 63		      sta	dlpnt
  10297  f3a0				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
  10298  f3a0				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
  10299  f3a0					      else		; !VSCROLL
  10300  f3a0		       bd 69 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
  10301  f3a3					      endif		; !VSCROLL
  10302  f3a3				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10303  f3a3				  -	      adc	#0
  10304  f3a3					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10305  f3a3		       85 64		      sta	dlpnt+1
  10306  f3a5
  10307  f3a5							;Create DL entry for the characters
  10308  f3a5
  10309  f3a5		       b4 65		      ldy	dlend,x	;Get the index to the end of this DL
  10310  f3a7
  10311  f3a7				  -	      ifconst	CHECKOVERWRITE
  10312  f3a7				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
  10313  f3a7				  -	      bne	continueplotcharacters
  10314  f3a7				  -	      rts
  10315  f3a7				  -continueplotcharacters
  10316  f3a7					      endif
  10317  f3a7
  10318  f3a7		       a5 42		      lda	temp1	; character map data, lo byte
  10319  f3a9		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(1) store low address
  10320  f3ab
  10321  f3ab		       c8		      iny
  10322  f3ac		       ad 06 21 	      lda	charactermode
  10323  f3af		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(2) store mode
  10324  f3b1
  10325  f3b1		       c8		      iny
  10326  f3b2		       a5 43		      lda	temp2	; character map, hi byte
  10327  f3b4		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(3) store high address
  10328  f3b6
  10329  f3b6		       c8		      iny
  10330  f3b7		       a5 44		      lda	temp3	;palette|width
  10331  f3b9		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(4) store palette|width
  10332  f3bb
  10333  f3bb		       c8		      iny
  10334  f3bc		       a5 45		      lda	temp4	;Horizontal position
  10335  f3be		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(5) store horizontal position
  10336  f3c0
  10337  f3c0		       c8		      iny
  10338  f3c1		       94 65		      sty	dlend,x	; save display list end byte
  10339  f3c3		       60		      rts
  10340  f3c4
  10341  f3c4
  10342  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	plotvalueonscreen
  10343  f3c4				  -plotcharacterslive
  10344  f3c4				  -			; a version of plotcharacters that draws live and minimally disrupts the screen...
  10345  f3c4				  -
  10346  f3c4				  -			;arguments:
  10347  f3c4				  -			; temp1=lo charactermap
  10348  f3c4				  -			; temp2=hi charactermap
  10349  f3c4				  -			; temp3=palette | width byte
  10350  f3c4				  -			; temp4=x
  10351  f3c4				  -			; temp5=y
  10352  f3c4				  -
  10353  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp5	;Y position
  10354  f3c4				  -
  10355  f3c4				  -	      tax
  10356  f3c4				  -
  10357  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
  10358  f3c4				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
  10359  f3c4				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
  10360  f3c4				  -	      else		; !VSCROLL
  10361  f3c4				  -	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to DL that the characters are in
  10362  f3c4				  -	      endif		; !VSCROLL
  10363  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10364  f3c4				  -	      clc
  10365  f3c4				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
  10366  f3c4				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10367  f3c4				  -	      sta	dlpnt
  10368  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
  10369  f3c4				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
  10370  f3c4				  -	      else		; !VSCROLL
  10371  f3c4				  -	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
  10372  f3c4				  -	      endif		; !VSCROLL
  10373  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10374  f3c4				  -	      adc	#0
  10375  f3c4				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10376  f3c4				  -	      sta	dlpnt+1
  10377  f3c4				  -
  10378  f3c4				  -			;Create DL entry for the characters
  10379  f3c4				  -
  10380  f3c4				  -	      ldy	dlend,x	;Get the index to the end of this DL
  10381  f3c4				  -
  10382  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	CHECKOVERWRITE
  10383  f3c4				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
  10384  f3c4				  -	      bne	continueplotcharacterslive
  10385  f3c4				  -	      rts
  10386  f3c4				  -continueplotcharacterslive
  10387  f3c4				  -	      endif
  10388  f3c4				  -
  10389  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp1	; character map data, lo byte
  10390  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(1) store low address
  10391  f3c4				  -
  10392  f3c4				  -	      iny
  10393  f3c4				  -			; we don't add the second byte yet, since the charmap could briefly
  10394  f3c4				  -			; render without a proper character map address, width, or position.
  10395  f3c4				  -	      lda	charactermode
  10396  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(2) store mode
  10397  f3c4				  -
  10398  f3c4				  -	      iny
  10399  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp2	; character map, hi byte
  10400  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(3) store high address
  10401  f3c4				  -
  10402  f3c4				  -	      iny
  10403  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp3	;palette|width
  10404  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(4) store palette|width
  10405  f3c4				  -
  10406  f3c4				  -	      iny
  10407  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp4	;Horizontal position
  10408  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(5) store horizontal position
  10409  f3c4				  -
  10410  f3c4				  -	      iny
  10411  f3c4				  -	      sty	dlend,x	; save display list end byte
  10412  f3c4				  -
  10413  f3c4				  -	      rts
  10414  f3c4					      endif		;plotcharacterslive
  10415  f3c4
  10416  f3c4					      ifconst	USED_PLOTVALUE
  10417  f3c4				   plotvalue
  10418  f3c4							; calling 7800basic command:
  10419  f3c4							; plotvalue digit_gfx palette variable/data number_of_digits screen_x screen_y
  10420  f3c4							; ...displays the variable as BCD digits
  10421  f3c4							;
  10422  f3c4							; asm sub arguments:
  10423  f3c4							; temp1=lo charactermap
  10424  f3c4							; temp2=hi charactermap
  10425  f3c4							; temp3=palette | width byte
  10426  f3c4							; temp4=x
  10427  f3c4							; temp5=y
  10428  f3c4							; temp6=number of digits
  10429  f3c4							; temp7=lo variable
  10430  f3c4							; temp8=hi variable
  10431  f3c4							; temp9=character mode
  10432  f3c4
  10433  f3c4		       00 47	   plotdigitcount =	temp6
  10434  f3c4
  10435  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	ZONELOCKS
  10436  f3c4				  -	      ldx	temp5
  10437  f3c4				  -	      ldy	dlend,x
  10438  f3c4				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
  10439  f3c4				  -	      bne	carryonplotvalue
  10440  f3c4				  -	      rts
  10441  f3c4				  -carryonplotvalue
  10442  f3c4					      endif
  10443  f3c4
  10444  f3c4		       a9 00		      lda	#0
  10445  f3c6		       a8		      tay
  10446  f3c7		       ae ad 01 	      ldx	valbufend
  10447  f3ca
  10448  f3ca		       a5 47		      lda	plotdigitcount
  10449  f3cc		       29 01		      and	#1
  10450  f3ce		       f0 07		      beq	pvnibble2char
  10451  f3d0		       a9 00		      lda	#0
  10452  f3d2		       9d 00 20 	      sta	VALBUFFER,x	; just in case we skip this digit
  10453  f3d5		       f0 10		      beq	pvnibble2char_skipnibble
  10454  f3d7
  10455  f3d7				   pvnibble2char
  10456  f3d7							; high nibble...
  10457  f3d7		       b1 48		      lda	(temp7),y
  10458  f3d9		       29 f0		      and	#$f0
  10459  f3db		       4a		      lsr
  10460  f3dc		       4a		      lsr
  10461  f3dd		       4a		      lsr
  10462  f3de				  -	      ifnconst	DOUBLEWIDE	; multiply value by 2 for double-width
  10463  f3de				  -	      lsr
  10464  f3de					      endif
  10465  f3de
  10466  f3de		       18		      clc
  10467  f3df		       65 42		      adc	temp1	; add the offset to character graphics to our value
  10468  f3e1		       9d 00 20 	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
  10469  f3e4		       e8		      inx
  10470  f3e5		       c6 47		      dec	plotdigitcount
  10471  f3e7
  10472  f3e7				   pvnibble2char_skipnibble
  10473  f3e7							; low nibble...
  10474  f3e7		       b1 48		      lda	(temp7),y
  10475  f3e9		       29 0f		      and	#$0f
  10476  f3eb					      ifconst	DOUBLEWIDE	; multiply value by 2 for double-width
  10477  f3eb		       0a		      asl
  10478  f3ec					      endif
  10479  f3ec		       18		      clc
  10480  f3ed		       65 42		      adc	temp1	; add the offset to character graphics to our value
  10481  f3ef		       9d 00 20 	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
  10482  f3f2		       e8		      inx
  10483  f3f3		       c8		      iny
  10484  f3f4
  10485  f3f4		       c6 47		      dec	plotdigitcount
  10486  f3f6		       d0 df		      bne	pvnibble2char
  10487  f3f8
  10488  f3f8							;point to the start of our valuebuffer
  10489  f3f8		       18		      clc
  10490  f3f9		       a9 00		      lda	#<VALBUFFER
  10491  f3fb		       6d ad 01 	      adc	valbufend
  10492  f3fe		       85 42		      sta	temp1
  10493  f400		       a9 20		      lda	#>VALBUFFER
  10494  f402		       69 00		      adc	#0
  10495  f404		       85 43		      sta	temp2
  10496  f406
  10497  f406							;advance valbufend to the end of our value buffer
  10498  f406		       8e ad 01 	      stx	valbufend
  10499  f409
  10500  f409					      ifnconst	plotvalueonscreen
  10501  f409		       4c 94 f3 	      jmp	plotcharacters
  10502  f40c				  -	      else
  10503  f40c				  -	      jmp	plotcharacterslive
  10504  f40c					      endif
  10505  f40c
  10506  f40c					      endif		; USED_PLOTVALUE
  10507  f40c
  10508  f40c
  10509  f40c				  -	      ifconst	USED_PLOTVALUEEXTRA
  10510  f40c				  -plotdigitcount =	temp6
  10511  f40c				  -plotvalueextra
  10512  f40c				  -			; calling 7800basic command:
  10513  f40c				  -			; plotvalue digit_gfx palette variable/data number_of_digits screen_x screen_y
  10514  f40c				  -			; ...displays the variable as BCD digits
  10515  f40c				  -			;
  10516  f40c				  -			; asm sub arguments:
  10517  f40c				  -			; temp1=lo charactermap
  10518  f40c				  -			; temp2=hi charactermap
  10519  f40c				  -			; temp3=palette | width byte
  10520  f40c				  -			; temp4=x
  10521  f40c				  -			; temp5=y
  10522  f40c				  -			; temp6=number of digits
  10523  f40c				  -			; temp7=lo variable
  10524  f40c				  -			; temp8=hi variable
  10525  f40c				  -
  10526  f40c				  -	      lda	#0
  10527  f40c				  -	      tay
  10528  f40c				  -	      ldx	valbufend
  10529  f40c				  -	      ifnconst	plotvalueonscreen
  10530  f40c				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
  10531  f40c				  -	      endif
  10532  f40c				  -
  10533  f40c				  -	      lda	plotdigitcount
  10534  f40c				  -	      and	#1
  10535  f40c				  -
  10536  f40c				  -	      bne	pvnibble2char_skipnibbleextra
  10537  f40c				  -
  10538  f40c				  -pvnibble2charextra
  10539  f40c				  -			; high nibble...
  10540  f40c				  -	      lda	(temp7),y
  10541  f40c				  -	      and	#$f0
  10542  f40c				  -	      lsr
  10543  f40c				  -	      lsr
  10544  f40c				  -	      ifnconst	DOUBLEWIDE	; multiply value by 2 for double-width
  10545  f40c				  -	      lsr
  10546  f40c				  -	      endif
  10547  f40c				  -	      clc
  10548  f40c				  -	      adc	temp1	; add the offset to character graphics to our value
  10549  f40c				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
  10550  f40c				  -	      inx
  10551  f40c				  -
  10552  f40c				  -			; second half of the digit
  10553  f40c				  -	      clc
  10554  f40c				  -	      adc	#1
  10555  f40c				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
  10556  f40c				  -	      inx
  10557  f40c				  -	      dec	plotdigitcount
  10558  f40c				  -
  10559  f40c				  -pvnibble2char_skipnibbleextra
  10560  f40c				  -			; low nibble...
  10561  f40c				  -	      lda	(temp7),y
  10562  f40c				  -	      and	#$0f
  10563  f40c				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEWIDE	; multiply value by 2 for double-width
  10564  f40c				  -	      asl
  10565  f40c				  -	      endif
  10566  f40c				  -	      asl
  10567  f40c				  -
  10568  f40c				  -	      clc
  10569  f40c				  -	      adc	temp1	; add the offset to character graphics to our value
  10570  f40c				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
  10571  f40c				  -	      inx
  10572  f40c				  -
  10573  f40c				  -	      clc
  10574  f40c				  -	      adc	#1
  10575  f40c				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
  10576  f40c				  -	      inx
  10577  f40c				  -	      iny
  10578  f40c				  -
  10579  f40c				  -	      dec	plotdigitcount
  10580  f40c				  -	      bne	pvnibble2charextra
  10581  f40c				  -
  10582  f40c				  -			;point to the start of our valuebuffer
  10583  f40c				  -	      clc
  10584  f40c				  -	      lda	#<VALBUFFER
  10585  f40c				  -	      adc	valbufend
  10586  f40c				  -	      sta	temp1
  10587  f40c				  -	      lda	#>VALBUFFER
  10588  f40c				  -	      adc	#0
  10589  f40c				  -	      sta	temp2
  10590  f40c				  -
  10591  f40c				  -			;advance valbufend to the end of our value buffer
  10592  f40c				  -	      stx	valbufend
  10593  f40c				  -
  10594  f40c				  -	      ifnconst	plotvalueonscreen
  10595  f40c				  -	      jmp	plotcharacters
  10596  f40c				  -	      else
  10597  f40c				  -	      jmp	plotcharacterslive
  10598  f40c				  -	      endif
  10599  f40c					      endif		; USED_PLOTVALUEEXTRA
  10600  f40c
  10601  f40c				   boxcollision
  10602  f40c				  -	      ifconst	BOXCOLLISION
  10603  f40c				  -			; the worst case cycle-time for the code below is 43 cycles.
  10604  f40c				  -			; unfortunately, prior to getting here we've burned 44 cycles in argument setup. eep!
  10605  f40c				  -
  10606  f40c				  -			;__boxx1 = accumulator
  10607  f40c				  -			;__boxy1 = y
  10608  f40c				  -__boxw1    =	temp3
  10609  f40c				  -__boxh1    =	temp4
  10610  f40c				  -
  10611  f40c				  -__boxx2    =	temp5
  10612  f40c				  -__boxy2    =	temp6
  10613  f40c				  -__boxw2    =	temp7
  10614  f40c				  -__boxh2    =	temp8
  10615  f40c				  -
  10616  f40c				  -DoXCollisionCheck
  10617  f40c				  -			;lda __boxx1 ; skipped. already in the accumulator
  10618  f40c				  -	      cmp	__boxx2	;3
  10619  f40c				  -	      bcs	X1isbiggerthanX2	;2/3
  10620  f40c				  -X2isbiggerthanX1
  10621  f40c				  -			; carry is clear
  10622  f40c				  -	      adc	__boxw1	;3
  10623  f40c				  -	      cmp	__boxx2	;3
  10624  f40c				  -	      bcs	DoYCollisionCheck	;3/2
  10625  f40c				  -	      rts		;6 - carry clear, no collision
  10626  f40c				  -X1isbiggerthanX2
  10627  f40c				  -	      clc		;2
  10628  f40c				  -	      sbc	__boxw2	;3
  10629  f40c				  -	      cmp	__boxx2	;3
  10630  f40c				  -	      bcs	noboxcollision	;3/2
  10631  f40c				  -DoYCollisionCheck
  10632  f40c				  -	      tya		; 2 ; use to be "lda __boxy1"
  10633  f40c				  -	      cmp	__boxy2	;3
  10634  f40c				  -	      bcs	Y1isbiggerthanY2	;3/2
  10635  f40c				  -Y2isbiggerthanY1
  10636  f40c				  -			; carry is clear
  10637  f40c				  -	      adc	__boxh1	;3
  10638  f40c				  -	      cmp	__boxy2	;3
  10639  f40c				  -	      rts		;6
  10640  f40c				  -Y1isbiggerthanY2
  10641  f40c				  -	      clc		;2
  10642  f40c				  -	      sbc	__boxh2	;3
  10643  f40c				  -	      cmp	__boxy2	;3
  10644  f40c				  -	      bcs	noboxcollision	;3/2
  10645  f40c				  -yesboxcollision
  10646  f40c				  -	      sec		;2
  10647  f40c				  -	      rts		;6
  10648  f40c				  -noboxcollision
  10649  f40c				  -	      clc		;2
  10650  f40c				  -	      rts		;6
  10651  f40c					      endif		; BOXCOLLISION
  10652  f40c
  10653  f40c				   randomize
  10654  f40c		       a5 40		      lda	rand
  10655  f40e		       4a		      lsr
  10656  f40f		       26 41		      rol	rand16
  10657  f411		       90 02		      bcc	noeor
  10658  f413		       49 b4		      eor	#$B4
  10659  f415				   noeor
  10660  f415		       85 40		      sta	rand
  10661  f417		       45 41		      eor	rand16
  10662  f419		       60		      rts
  10663  f41a
  10664  f41a							; *** bcd conversion routine courtesy Omegamatrix
  10665  f41a							; *** http://atariage.com/forums/blog/563/entry-10832-hex-to-bcd-conversion-0-99/
  10666  f41a					      ifconst	.calledfunction_converttobcd
  10667  f41a				   converttobcd
  10668  f41a							;value to convert is in the accumulator
  10669  f41a		       85 42		      sta	temp1
  10670  f41c		       4a		      lsr
  10671  f41d		       65 42		      adc	temp1
  10672  f41f		       6a		      ror
  10673  f420		       4a		      lsr
  10674  f421		       4a		      lsr
  10675  f422		       65 42		      adc	temp1
  10676  f424		       6a		      ror
  10677  f425		       65 42		      adc	temp1
  10678  f427		       6a		      ror
  10679  f428		       4a		      lsr
  10680  f429		       29 3c		      and	#$3C
  10681  f42b		       85 43		      sta	temp2
  10682  f42d		       4a		      lsr
  10683  f42e		       65 43		      adc	temp2
  10684  f430		       65 42		      adc	temp1
  10685  f432		       60		      rts		; return the result in the accumulator
  10686  f433					      endif		; .calledfunction_converttobcd
  10687  f433
  10688  f433				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_mul8
  10689  f433				  -			; Y and A contain multiplicands, result in A
  10690  f433				  -mul8
  10691  f433				  -	      sty	temp1
  10692  f433				  -	      sta	temp2
  10693  f433				  -	      lda	#0
  10694  f433				  -reptmul8
  10695  f433				  -	      lsr	temp2
  10696  f433				  -	      bcc	skipmul8
  10697  f433				  -	      clc
  10698  f433				  -	      adc	temp1
  10699  f433				  -			;bcs donemul8 might save cycles?
  10700  f433				  -skipmul8
  10701  f433				  -			;beq donemul8 might save cycles?
  10702  f433				  -	      asl	temp1
  10703  f433				  -	      bne	reptmul8
  10704  f433				  -donemul8
  10705  f433				  -	      rts
  10706  f433					      endif		; .calledfunction_mul8
  10707  f433
  10708  f433				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_div8
  10709  f433				  -div8
  10710  f433				  -			; A=numerator Y=denominator, result in A
  10711  f433				  -	      cpy	#2
  10712  f433				  -	      bcc	div8end+1	;div by 0 = bad, div by 1=no calc needed, so bail out
  10713  f433				  -	      sty	temp1
  10714  f433				  -	      ldy	#$ff
  10715  f433				  -div8loop
  10716  f433				  -	      sbc	temp1
  10717  f433				  -	      iny
  10718  f433				  -	      bcs	div8loop
  10719  f433				  -div8end
  10720  f433				  -	      tya
  10721  f433				  -			; result in A
  10722  f433				  -	      rts
  10723  f433					      endif		; .calledfunction_div8
  10724  f433
  10725  f433				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_mul16
  10726  f433				  -			; Y and A contain multiplicands, result in temp2,A=low, temp1=high
  10727  f433				  -mul16
  10728  f433				  -	      sty	temp1
  10729  f433				  -	      sta	temp2
  10730  f433				  -
  10731  f433				  -	      lda	#0
  10732  f433				  -	      ldx	#8
  10733  f433				  -	      lsr	temp1
  10734  f433				  -mul16_1
  10735  f433				  -	      bcc	mul16_2
  10736  f433				  -	      clc
  10737  f433				  -	      adc	temp2
  10738  f433				  -mul16_2
  10739  f433				  -	      ror
  10740  f433				  -	      ror	temp1
  10741  f433				  -	      dex
  10742  f433				  -	      bne	mul16_1
  10743  f433				  -	      sta	temp2
  10744  f433				  -	      rts
  10745  f433					      endif		; .calledfunction_mul16
  10746  f433
  10747  f433				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_div16
  10748  f433				  -			; div int/int
  10749  f433				  -			; numerator in A, denom in temp1
  10750  f433				  -			; returns with quotient in A, remainder in temp1
  10751  f433				  -div16
  10752  f433				  -	      sta	temp2
  10753  f433				  -	      sty	temp1
  10754  f433				  -	      lda	#0
  10755  f433				  -	      ldx	#8
  10756  f433				  -	      asl	temp2
  10757  f433				  -div16_1

  10759  f433				  -	      cmp	temp1
  10760  f433				  -	      bcc	div16_2
  10761  f433				  -	      sbc	temp1
  10762  f433				  -div16_2

  10764  f433				  -	      dex

  10766  f433				  -	      sta	temp1
  10767  f433				  -	      lda	temp2
  10768  f433				  -	      rts
  10769  f433					      endif		; .calledfunction_div16
  10770  f433
  10771  f433				  -	      ifconst	bankswitchmode

  10775  f433				  -	      endif

  10795  f433				  -	      endif

  10806  f433				   checkselectswitch

  10815  f43e		       60		      rts
  10816  f43f
  10817  f43f				  -	      ifconst	FINESCROLLENABLED
  10818  f43f				  -finescrolldlls
  10819  f43f				  -	      ldx	temp1	; first DLL index x3
  10820  f43f				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
  10821  f43f				  -	      and	#%11110000
  10822  f43f				  -	      ora	finescrolly
  10823  f43f				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
  10824  f43f				  -
  10825  f43f				  -	      ldx	temp2	; last DLL index x3
  10826  f43f				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
  10827  f43f				  -	      and	#%11110000
  10828  f43f				  -	      ora	finescrolly
  10829  f43f				  -	      eor	#(WZONEHEIGHT-1)
  10830  f43f				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
  10831  f43f				  -	      rts
  10832  f43f					      endif		; FINESCROLLENABLED
  10833  f43f
  10834  f43f				  -	      ifconst	USED_ADJUSTVISIBLE
  10835  f43f				  -adjustvisible
  10836  f43f				  -			; called with temp1=first visible zone *3, temp2=last visible zone *3
  10837  f43f				  -	      jsr	waitforvblankstart	; ensure vblank just started
  10838  f43f				  -	      ldx	visibleDLLstart
  10839  f43f				  -findfirstinterrupt
  10840  f43f				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
  10841  f43f				  -	      bmi	foundfirstinterrupt
  10842  f43f				  -	      inx
  10843  f43f				  -	      inx
  10844  f43f				  -	      inx
  10845  f43f				  -	      bne	findfirstinterrupt
  10846  f43f				  -foundfirstinterrupt
  10847  f43f				  -	      and	#%01111111	; clear the interrupt bit
  10848  f43f				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
  10849  f43f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10850  f43f				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
  10851  f43f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10852  f43f				  -	      ldx	overscanDLLstart
  10853  f43f				  -findlastinterrupt
  10854  f43f				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
  10855  f43f				  -	      bmi	foundlastinterrupt
  10856  f43f				  -	      dex
  10857  f43f				  -	      dex
  10858  f43f				  -	      dex
  10859  f43f				  -	      bne	findlastinterrupt
  10860  f43f				  -foundlastinterrupt
  10861  f43f				  -	      and	#%01111111	; clear the interrupt bit
  10862  f43f				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
  10863  f43f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10864  f43f				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
  10865  f43f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10866  f43f				  -			;now we need to set the new interrupts
  10867  f43f				  -	      clc
  10868  f43f				  -	      lda	temp1
  10869  f43f				  -	      adc	visibleDLLstart
  10870  f43f				  -	      tax
  10871  f43f				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
  10872  f43f				  -	      ora	#%10000000
  10873  f43f				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
  10874  f43f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10875  f43f				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
  10876  f43f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10877  f43f				  -	      clc
  10878  f43f				  -	      lda	temp2
  10879  f43f				  -	      adc	visibleDLLstart
  10880  f43f				  -	      tax
  10881  f43f				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
  10882  f43f				  -	      ora	#%10000000
  10883  f43f				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
  10884  f43f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10885  f43f				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
  10886  f43f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10887  f43f				  -	      jsr	vblankresync
  10888  f43f				  -	      rts
  10889  f43f					      endif		; USED_ADJUSTVISIBLE

  10891  f43f				   vblankresync
  10892  f43f		       20 af f4 	      jsr	waitforvblankstart	; ensure vblank just started
  10893  f442		       a9 00		      lda	#0
  10894  f444		       85 4d		      sta	visibleover
  10895  f446		       a9 03		      lda	#3
  10896  f448		       8d b2 01 	      sta	interruptindex
  10897  f44b		       60		      rts
  10898  f44c
  10899  f44c				   createallgamedlls
  10900  f44c		       a0 3c		      ldy	#(DLLLUTEND-DLLLUT)
  10901  f44e				   createallgamedllsloop
  10902  f44e		       88		      dey
  10903  f44f		       b9 73 f4 	      lda	DLLLUT,y
  10904  f452		       99 00 18 	      sta	DLLMEM,y
  10905  f455				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10906  f455				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,y
  10907  f455					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER

  10909  f457		       d0 f5		      bne	createallgamedllsloop
  10910  f459
  10911  f459				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10912  f459				  -	      ldy	#(DLLLUTNONVISSTART-DLLLUTVISSTART)
  10913  f459				  -fixdoublebuffer
  10914  f459				  -	      dey
  10915  f459				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
  10916  f459				  -	      clc
  10917  f459				  -	      adc	#DOUBLEBUFFEROFFSET
  10918  f459				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y

  10922  f459				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
  10923  f459				  -	      dey
  10924  f459				  -	      bne	fixdoublebuffer
  10925  f459					      endif
  10926  f459
  10927  f459				  -	      ifconst	BANKSET_DL_IN_CARTRAM
  10928  f459				  -			; N.B. banksets doesn't in-fact allow DL in cart-ram, so this conditional
  10929  f459				  -			; is always skipped. This is here in case some day the limitation is
  10930  f459				  -			; worked around, but it's untested.
  10931  f459				  -
  10932  f459				  -			; With bankset cart ram, we added $8000 to the DL address so plot
  10933  f459				  -			; functions would hit the cart-ram write-address. We need to subtract $80
  10934  f459				  -			; so Maria will read from the cart-ram read-address.
  10935  f459				  -	      ldy	#(DLLLUTNONVISSTART-DLLLUTVISSTART)
  10936  f459				  -fixbanksetaddresses
  10937  f459				  -	      dey
  10938  f459				  -	      dey
  10939  f459				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
  10940  f459				  -	      and	#%01111111
  10941  f459				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
  10942  f459				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  10943  f459				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
  10944  f459				  -	      and	#%01111111
  10945  f459				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
  10946  f459				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  10947  f459				  -	      dey
  10948  f459				  -	      bne	fixbanksetaddresses
  10949  f459					      endif		; BANKSET_DL_IN_CARTRAM

  10982  f476		       47 21 00 	      .byte.b	($07|(WZONEHEIGHT*4)),$21,$00	;  8 blank lines

  10995  f47c				  -	      .byte	($00|(WZONEHEIGHT*4)),$21,$00	;  1 blank lines

  11048  f4a0					      endif

  11050  f4a0				  -	      .byte	($00|(WZONEHEIGHT*4)|(WZONEHEIGHT-1)),>ZONE24ADDRESS,<ZONE24ADDRESS
  11051  f4a0					      endif
  11052  f4a0				  -	      ifconst	ZONE25ADDRESS
  11053  f4a0				  -	      .byte	($00|(WZONEHEIGHT*4)|(WZONEHEIGHT-1)),>ZONE25ADDRESS,<ZONE25ADDRESS
  11054  f4a0					      endif

  11056  f4a0				  -	      .byte	($00|(WZONEHEIGHT*4)|(WZONEHEIGHT-1)),>ZONE26ADDRESS,<ZONE26ADDRESS
  11057  f4a0					      endif

  11060  f4a0					      endif
  11061  f4a0				   DLLLUTNONVISSTART
  11062  f4a0		       c3 21 00 	      .byte.b	($83|(WZONEHEIGHT*4)),$21,$00	;  4 blank lines
  11063  f4a3							;	 ^--NMI 2: start of non-visible
  11064  f4a3		       cf 21 00 	      .byte.b	($8F|(WZONEHEIGHT*4)),$21,$00	; 16 blank lines
  11065  f4a6							;	 ^--NMI 3: start of overscan
  11066  f4a6		       4f 21 00 	      .byte.b	($0F|(WZONEHEIGHT*4)),$21,$00	; 16 blank lines
  11067  f4a9		       4f 21 00 	      .byte.b	($0F|(WZONEHEIGHT*4)),$21,$00	; 16 blank lines
  11068  f4ac		       4f 21 00 	      .byte.b	($0F|(WZONEHEIGHT*4)),$21,$00	; 16 blank lines

  11094  f4b8				  -

  11130  f4b8				  -	      beq	flipdisplaybufferreturn
  11131  f4b8				  -
  11132  f4b8				  -			; The doublebuffer buffer is dirty, so the game code must have issued a savescreen recently.
  11133  f4b8				  -			; To make savescreen work with the new working buffer, we need to copy over the saved objects
  11134  f4b8				  -			; from the displayed buffer to the working buffer...

  11197  f4b8				  -	      .byte	$00, $01, $ff, $00	; new=00
  11198  f4b8				  -	      .byte	$ff, $00, $00, $01	; new=01
  11199  f4b8				  -	      .byte	$01, $00, $00, $ff	; new=10
  11200  f4b8				  -	      .byte	$00, $ff, $01, $00	; new=11
  11201  f4b8				  -

  11215  f4b8				  -	      .byte	%0000, %0001, %0010, %0011
  11216  f4b8				  -	      .byte	%0000, %0001, %0010, %0011
  11217  f4b8				  -	      .byte	%0000, %0001, %0010, %0011
  11218  f4b8				  -

  11220  f4b8				  -

  11223  f4b8				  -	      .byte	%0100, %1100, %0110, %1110

  11229  f4b8				  -	      .byte	%1000, %1001, %1010, %1011

  11233  f4b8					      endif		; MOUSESUPPORT
  11234  f4b8
  11235  f4b8				   mouse0update
  11236  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	MOUSE0SUPPORT
  11237  f4b8				  -
  11238  f4b8				  -mousetableselect =	inttemp2
  11239  f4b8				  -mousexdelta =	inttemp3
  11240  f4b8				  -mouseydelta =	inttemp4
  11241  f4b8				  -lastSWCHA  =	inttemp6
  11242  f4b8				  -
  11243  f4b8				  -			; 0000YyXx st mouse
  11244  f4b8				  -			; 0000xyXY amiga mouse
  11245  f4b8				  -
  11246  f4b8				  -	      lda	#$ff
  11247  f4b8				  -	      sta	lastSWCHA
  11248  f4b8				  -
  11249  f4b8				  -	      ldy	port0control
  11250  f4b8				  -
  11251  f4b8				  -	      lda	#%00010000
  11252  f4b8				  -	      cpy	#9	; AMIGA?
  11253  f4b8				  -	      bne	skipamigabitsfix0
  11254  f4b8				  -	      lda	#0
  11255  f4b8				  -skipamigabitsfix0
  11256  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousetableselect
  11257  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	DRIVINGBOOST
  11258  f4b8				  -	      cpy	#6	; DRIVING?
  11259  f4b8				  -	      bne	skipdriving0setup
  11260  f4b8				  -			; swap mousex0 and mousey0. mousex seen by the 7800basic program
  11261  f4b8				  -			; trails the actual mousex0, so we can smoothly interpolate toward
  11262  f4b8				  -			; the actual position. This actual position is stored in mousey0
  11263  f4b8				  -			; after the driver has run.
  11264  f4b8				  -	      ldx	mousex0
  11265  f4b8				  -	      lda	mousey0
  11266  f4b8				  -	      stx	mousey0
  11267  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousex0
  11268  f4b8				  -skipdriving0setup
  11269  f4b8				  -	      endif		; DRIVINGBOOST
  11270  f4b8				  -
  11271  f4b8				  -	      lda	#0
  11272  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousexdelta
  11273  f4b8				  -	      sta	mouseydelta
  11274  f4b8				  -
  11275  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSETIME
  11276  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSEXONLY
  11277  f4b8				  -	      lda	#180	; minimum for x+y
  11278  f4b8				  -	      else
  11279  f4b8				  -	      lda	#100	; minimum for just x
  11280  f4b8				  -	      endif
  11281  f4b8				  -	      else
  11282  f4b8				  -	      lda	#MOUSETIME
  11283  f4b8				  -	      endif
  11284  f4b8				  -	      jsr	SETTIM64T	; INTIM is in Y
  11285  f4b8				  -
  11286  f4b8				  -mouse0updateloop
  11287  f4b8				  -	      lda	SWCHA
  11288  f4b8				  -	      asr	#%11110000	; Undocumented. A = A & #IMM, then LSR A.
  11289  f4b8				  -	      cmp	lastSWCHA
  11290  f4b8				  -	      beq	mouse0loopcondition
  11291  f4b8				  -	      sta	lastSWCHA
  11292  f4b8				  -	      lsr
  11293  f4b8				  -	      lsr
  11294  f4b8				  -	      lsr
  11295  f4b8				  -
  11296  f4b8				  -	      ora	mousetableselect	; atari/amiga decoding table selection
  11297  f4b8				  -
  11298  f4b8				  -			; st mice encode on different bits/joystick-lines than amiga mice...
  11299  f4b8				  -			; 0000YyXx st mouse
  11300  f4b8				  -			; 0000xyXY amiga mouse
  11301  f4b8				  -			; ...so can shuffle the amiga bits to reuse the st driver.
  11302  f4b8				  -	      tay
  11303  f4b8				  -	      lax	amigatoataribits,y
  11304  f4b8				  -
  11305  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSEXONLY
  11306  f4b8				  -			; first the Y...
  11307  f4b8				  -	      and	#%00001100
  11308  f4b8				  -	      ora	mousecodey0
  11309  f4b8				  -	      tay
  11310  f4b8				  -	      lda	rotationalcompare,y
  11311  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11312  f4b8				  -	      adc	mouseydelta
  11313  f4b8				  -	      sta	mouseydelta
  11314  f4b8				  -	      tya
  11315  f4b8				  -	      lsr
  11316  f4b8				  -	      lsr
  11317  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousecodey0
  11318  f4b8				  -	      txa
  11319  f4b8				  -			; ...then the X...
  11320  f4b8				  -	      and	#%00000011
  11321  f4b8				  -	      tax
  11322  f4b8				  -	      endif		; !MOUSEXONLY
  11323  f4b8				  -
  11324  f4b8				  -	      asl
  11325  f4b8				  -	      asl
  11326  f4b8				  -	      ora	mousecodex0
  11327  f4b8				  -	      tay
  11328  f4b8				  -	      lda	rotationalcompare,y
  11329  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousexdelta	; carry was clear by previous ASL
  11330  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousexdelta
  11331  f4b8				  -	      stx	mousecodex0
  11332  f4b8				  -mouse0loopcondition
  11333  f4b8				  -	      lda	TIMINT
  11334  f4b8				  -	      bpl	mouse0updateloop
  11335  f4b8				  -
  11336  f4b8				  -			; *** adapt to selected device resolution.
  11337  f4b8				  -	      ldx	port0control
  11338  f4b8				  -
  11339  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	PRECISIONMOUSING
  11340  f4b8				  -	      ldy	port0resolution
  11341  f4b8				  -	      bne	mouse0halveddone
  11342  f4b8				  -	      cpx	#6	; half-resolution is no good for driving wheels
  11343  f4b8				  -	      beq	mouse0halveddone
  11344  f4b8				  -			; resolution=0 is half mouse resolution, necessary for precision
  11345  f4b8				  -			; mousing on a 160x240 screen with a 1000 dpi mouse.
  11346  f4b8				  -
  11347  f4b8				  -	      lda	mousexdelta
  11348  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11349  f4b8				  -	      ror		; do a signed divide by 2.
  11350  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11351  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousex0
  11352  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousex0
  11353  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSEXONLY
  11354  f4b8				  -	      lda	mouseydelta
  11355  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11356  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousey0
  11357  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousey0
  11358  f4b8				  -	      endif
  11359  f4b8				  -			; at half resolution we just exit after updating x and y
  11360  f4b8				  -	      jmp	LLRET0
  11361  f4b8				  -mouse0halveddone
  11362  f4b8				  -	      endif		; PRECISIONMOUSING
  11363  f4b8				  -
  11364  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSEXONLY
  11365  f4b8				  -	      asl	mouseydelta	; *2 because Y resolution is finer
  11366  f4b8				  -	      ldy	port0resolution
  11367  f4b8				  -	      dey
  11368  f4b8				  -	      lda	#0
  11369  f4b8				  -mousey0resolutionfix
  11370  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11371  f4b8				  -	      adc	mouseydelta
  11372  f4b8				  -	      dey
  11373  f4b8				  -	      bpl	mousey0resolutionfix
  11374  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11375  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousey0
  11376  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousey0
  11377  f4b8				  -	      endif		; MOUSEXONLY
  11378  f4b8				  -
  11379  f4b8				  -	      ldy	port0resolution
  11380  f4b8				  -	      dey
  11381  f4b8				  -	      lda	#0
  11382  f4b8				  -mousex0resolutionfix
  11383  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11384  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousexdelta
  11385  f4b8				  -	      dey
  11386  f4b8				  -	      bpl	mousex0resolutionfix
  11387  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	DRIVINGBOOST
  11388  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11389  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousex0
  11390  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousex0
  11391  f4b8				  -	      else
  11392  f4b8				  -	      cpx	#6
  11393  f4b8				  -	      beq	carryonmouse0boost
  11394  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11395  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousex0
  11396  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousex0
  11397  f4b8				  -	      jmp	LLRET0
  11398  f4b8				  -carryonmouse0boost
  11399  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousexdelta
  11400  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11401  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousecodey0
  11402  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousecodey0
  11403  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11404  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousex0
  11405  f4b8				  -	      tay		; save the target X
  11406  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousey0	; average in the smoothly-trailing X
  11407  f4b8				  -	      ror
  11408  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousex0	; mousex0 now has the smoothly trailing X
  11409  f4b8				  -	      sty	mousey0	; and mousey0 has the the target X
  11410  f4b8				  -
  11411  f4b8				  -			; check to see if the coordinate wrapped. If so, undo the averaging code.
  11412  f4b8				  -			; A has mousex0, the smoothly trailing X
  11413  f4b8				  -	      sbc	mousey0	; less the target X
  11414  f4b8				  -	      bpl	skipabsolutedrive0
  11415  f4b8				  -	      eor	#$ff
  11416  f4b8				  -skipabsolutedrive0
  11417  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#64	; just an unreasonably large change
  11418  f4b8				  -	      bcc	skipdrivewrapfix0
  11419  f4b8				  -	      sty	mousex0	; if X wrapped, we catch the trailing X up to the target X
  11420  f4b8				  -skipdrivewrapfix0
  11421  f4b8				  -
  11422  f4b8				  -			; get rid of the tweening if the distance travelled was very small
  11423  f4b8				  -	      lda	mousexdelta
  11424  f4b8				  -	      cmp	port0resolution
  11425  f4b8				  -	      bcs	skipbetweenfix0
  11426  f4b8				  -	      lda	mousex0
  11427  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousey0
  11428  f4b8				  -skipbetweenfix0
  11429  f4b8				  -
  11430  f4b8				  -drivingboostreductioncheck0
  11431  f4b8				  -			; The below code amounts to mousecodey0=mousecodey0-(mousecodey0/8)
  11432  f4b8				  -			; +ve mousecodey0 is converted to -ve to do the calculation, and then
  11433  f4b8				  -			; negated again because truncation during BCD math results in
  11434  f4b8				  -			; differing magnitudes, depending if the value is +ve or -ve.
  11435  f4b8				  -driving0fix
  11436  f4b8				  -	      lax	mousecodey0
  11437  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11438  f4b8				  -	      bcs	driving0skipnegate1
  11439  f4b8				  -	      eor	#$FF
  11440  f4b8				  -	      adc	#1
  11441  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousecodey0
  11442  f4b8				  -driving0skipnegate1
  11443  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11444  f4b8				  -	      ror
  11445  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11446  f4b8				  -	      ror
  11447  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11448  f4b8				  -	      ror
  11449  f4b8				  -	      sta	inttemp1
  11450  f4b8				  -	      lda	mousecodey0
  11451  f4b8				  -	      sec
  11452  f4b8				  -	      sbc	inttemp1
  11453  f4b8				  -	      cpx	#$80
  11454  f4b8				  -	      bcs	driving0skipnegate2
  11455  f4b8				  -	      eor	#$FF
  11456  f4b8				  -	      adc	#1
  11457  f4b8				  -driving0skipnegate2
  11458  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousecodey0
  11459  f4b8				  -drivingboostdone0
  11460  f4b8				  -	      endif		; DRIVINGBOOST
  11461  f4b8				  -
  11462  f4b8				  -	      jmp	LLRET0
  11463  f4b8				  -
  11464  f4b8					      endif		; MOUSE0SUPPORT
  11465  f4b8
  11466  f4b8				   mouse1update
  11467  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	MOUSE1SUPPORT
  11468  f4b8				  -
  11469  f4b8				  -mousetableselect =	inttemp2
  11470  f4b8				  -mousexdelta =	inttemp3
  11471  f4b8				  -mouseydelta =	inttemp4
  11472  f4b8				  -lastSWCHA  =	inttemp6
  11473  f4b8				  -
  11474  f4b8				  -			; 0000YyXx st mouse
  11475  f4b8				  -			; 0000xyXY amiga mouse
  11476  f4b8				  -
  11477  f4b8				  -	      lda	#$ff
  11478  f4b8				  -	      sta	lastSWCHA
  11479  f4b8				  -
  11480  f4b8				  -	      ldy	port1control
  11481  f4b8				  -
  11482  f4b8				  -	      lda	#%00010000
  11483  f4b8				  -	      cpy	#9	; AMIGA?
  11484  f4b8				  -	      bne	skipamigabitsfix1
  11485  f4b8				  -	      lda	#0
  11486  f4b8				  -skipamigabitsfix1
  11487  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousetableselect
  11488  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	DRIVINGBOOST
  11489  f4b8				  -	      cpy	#6	; DRIVING?
  11490  f4b8				  -	      bne	skipdriving1setup
  11491  f4b8				  -			; swap mousex1 and mousey1. mousex seen by the 7800basic program
  11492  f4b8				  -			; trails the actual mousex1, so we can smoothly interpolate toward
  11493  f4b8				  -			; the actual position. This actual position is stored in mousey1
  11494  f4b8				  -			; after the driver has run.
  11495  f4b8				  -	      ldx	mousex1
  11496  f4b8				  -	      lda	mousey1
  11497  f4b8				  -	      stx	mousey1
  11498  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousex1
  11499  f4b8				  -skipdriving1setup
  11500  f4b8				  -	      endif		; DRIVINGBOOST
  11501  f4b8				  -
  11502  f4b8				  -	      lda	#0
  11503  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousexdelta
  11504  f4b8				  -	      sta	mouseydelta
  11505  f4b8				  -
  11506  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSETIME
  11507  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSEXONLY
  11508  f4b8				  -	      lda	#180	; minimum for x+y
  11509  f4b8				  -	      else
  11510  f4b8				  -	      lda	#100	; minimum for just x
  11511  f4b8				  -	      endif
  11512  f4b8				  -	      else
  11513  f4b8				  -	      lda	#MOUSETIME
  11514  f4b8				  -	      endif
  11515  f4b8				  -	      jsr	SETTIM64T	; INTIM is in Y
  11516  f4b8				  -
  11517  f4b8				  -mouse1updateloop
  11518  f4b8				  -	      lda	SWCHA
  11519  f4b8				  -	      and	#%00001111
  11520  f4b8				  -	      cmp	lastSWCHA
  11521  f4b8				  -	      beq	mouse1loopcondition
  11522  f4b8				  -	      sta	lastSWCHA
  11523  f4b8				  -
  11524  f4b8				  -	      ora	mousetableselect	; atari/amiga decoding table selection
  11525  f4b8				  -
  11526  f4b8				  -			; st mice encode on different bits/joystick-lines than amiga mice...
  11527  f4b8				  -			; 0000YyXx st mouse
  11528  f4b8				  -			; 0000xyXY amiga mouse
  11529  f4b8				  -			; ...so can shuffle the amiga bits to reuse the st driver.
  11530  f4b8				  -	      tay
  11531  f4b8				  -	      lax	amigatoataribits,y
  11532  f4b8				  -
  11533  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSEXONLY
  11534  f4b8				  -			; first the Y...
  11535  f4b8				  -	      and	#%00001100
  11536  f4b8				  -	      ora	mousecodey1
  11537  f4b8				  -	      tay
  11538  f4b8				  -	      lda	rotationalcompare,y
  11539  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11540  f4b8				  -	      adc	mouseydelta
  11541  f4b8				  -	      sta	mouseydelta
  11542  f4b8				  -	      tya
  11543  f4b8				  -	      lsr
  11544  f4b8				  -	      lsr
  11545  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousecodey1
  11546  f4b8				  -	      txa
  11547  f4b8				  -			; ...then the X...
  11548  f4b8				  -	      and	#%00000011
  11549  f4b8				  -	      tax
  11550  f4b8				  -	      endif		; !MOUSEXONLY
  11551  f4b8				  -
  11552  f4b8				  -	      asl
  11553  f4b8				  -	      asl
  11554  f4b8				  -	      ora	mousecodex1
  11555  f4b8				  -	      tay
  11556  f4b8				  -	      lda	rotationalcompare,y
  11557  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousexdelta	; carry was clear by previous ASL
  11558  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousexdelta
  11559  f4b8				  -	      stx	mousecodex1
  11560  f4b8				  -mouse1loopcondition
  11561  f4b8				  -	      lda	TIMINT
  11562  f4b8				  -	      bpl	mouse1updateloop
  11563  f4b8				  -
  11564  f4b8				  -			; *** adapt to selected device resolution.
  11565  f4b8				  -	      ldx	port1control
  11566  f4b8				  -
  11567  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	PRECISIONMOUSING
  11568  f4b8				  -	      ldy	port1resolution
  11569  f4b8				  -	      bne	mouse1halveddone
  11570  f4b8				  -	      cpx	#6	; half-resolution is no good for driving wheels
  11571  f4b8				  -	      beq	mouse1halveddone
  11572  f4b8				  -			; resolution=0 is half mouse resolution, necessary for precision
  11573  f4b8				  -			; mousing on a 160x240 screen with a 1000 dpi mouse.
  11574  f4b8				  -
  11575  f4b8				  -	      lda	mousexdelta
  11576  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11577  f4b8				  -	      ror		; do a signed divide by 2.
  11578  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11579  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousex1
  11580  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousex1
  11581  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSEXONLY
  11582  f4b8				  -	      lda	mouseydelta
  11583  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11584  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousey1
  11585  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousey1
  11586  f4b8				  -	      endif
  11587  f4b8				  -			; at half resolution we just exit after updating x and y
  11588  f4b8				  -	      jmp	LLRET1
  11589  f4b8				  -mouse1halveddone
  11590  f4b8				  -	      endif		; PRECISIONMOUSING
  11591  f4b8				  -
  11592  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	MOUSEXONLY
  11593  f4b8				  -	      asl	mouseydelta	; *2 because Y resolution is finer
  11594  f4b8				  -	      ldy	port1resolution
  11595  f4b8				  -	      dey
  11596  f4b8				  -	      lda	#0
  11597  f4b8				  -mousey1resolutionfix
  11598  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11599  f4b8				  -	      adc	mouseydelta
  11600  f4b8				  -	      dey
  11601  f4b8				  -	      bpl	mousey1resolutionfix
  11602  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11603  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousey1
  11604  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousey1
  11605  f4b8				  -	      endif		; MOUSEXONLY
  11606  f4b8				  -
  11607  f4b8				  -	      ldy	port1resolution
  11608  f4b8				  -	      dey
  11609  f4b8				  -	      lda	#0
  11610  f4b8				  -mousex1resolutionfix
  11611  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11612  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousexdelta
  11613  f4b8				  -	      dey
  11614  f4b8				  -	      bpl	mousex1resolutionfix
  11615  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	DRIVINGBOOST
  11616  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11617  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousex1
  11618  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousex1
  11619  f4b8				  -	      else
  11620  f4b8				  -	      cpx	#6
  11621  f4b8				  -	      beq	carryonmouse1boost
  11622  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11623  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousex1
  11624  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousex1
  11625  f4b8				  -	      jmp	LLRET1
  11626  f4b8				  -carryonmouse1boost
  11627  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousexdelta
  11628  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11629  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousecodey1
  11630  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousecodey1
  11631  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11632  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousex1
  11633  f4b8				  -	      tay		; save the target X
  11634  f4b8				  -	      adc	mousey1	; average in the smoothly-trailing X
  11635  f4b8				  -	      ror
  11636  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousex1	; mousex0 now has the smoothly trailing X
  11637  f4b8				  -	      sty	mousey1	; and mousey0 has the the target X
  11638  f4b8				  -
  11639  f4b8				  -			; check to see if the coordinate wrapped. If so, undo the averaging code.
  11640  f4b8				  -			; A has mousex1, the smoothly trailing X
  11641  f4b8				  -	      sbc	mousey1	; less the target X
  11642  f4b8				  -	      bpl	skipabsolutedrive1
  11643  f4b8				  -	      eor	#$ff
  11644  f4b8				  -skipabsolutedrive1
  11645  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#64	; just an unreasonably large change
  11646  f4b8				  -	      bcc	skipdrivewrapfix1
  11647  f4b8				  -	      sty	mousex1	; if X wrapped, we catch the trailing X up to the target X
  11648  f4b8				  -skipdrivewrapfix1
  11649  f4b8				  -
  11650  f4b8				  -			; get rid of the tweening if the distance travelled was very small
  11651  f4b8				  -	      lda	mousexdelta
  11652  f4b8				  -	      cmp	port1resolution
  11653  f4b8				  -	      bcs	skipbetweenfix1
  11654  f4b8				  -	      lda	mousex1
  11655  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousey1
  11656  f4b8				  -skipbetweenfix1
  11657  f4b8				  -
  11658  f4b8				  -drivingboostreductioncheck1
  11659  f4b8				  -			; The below code amounts to mousecodey0=mousecodey0-(mousecodey0/8)
  11660  f4b8				  -			; +ve mousecodey0 is converted to -ve to do the calculation, and then
  11661  f4b8				  -			; negated again because truncation during BCD math results in
  11662  f4b8				  -			; differing magnitudes, depending if the value is +ve or -ve.
  11663  f4b8				  -driving1fix
  11664  f4b8				  -	      lax	mousecodey1
  11665  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11666  f4b8				  -	      bcs	driving0skipnegate1
  11667  f4b8				  -	      eor	#$FF
  11668  f4b8				  -	      adc	#1
  11669  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousecodey1
  11670  f4b8				  -driving0skipnegate1
  11671  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11672  f4b8				  -	      ror
  11673  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11674  f4b8				  -	      ror
  11675  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#$80
  11676  f4b8				  -	      ror
  11677  f4b8				  -	      sta	inttemp1
  11678  f4b8				  -	      lda	mousecodey1
  11679  f4b8				  -	      sec
  11680  f4b8				  -	      sbc	inttemp1
  11681  f4b8				  -	      cpx	#$80
  11682  f4b8				  -	      bcs	driving1skipnegate2
  11683  f4b8				  -	      eor	#$FF
  11684  f4b8				  -	      adc	#1
  11685  f4b8				  -driving1skipnegate2
  11686  f4b8				  -	      sta	mousecodey1
  11687  f4b8				  -drivingboostdone1
  11688  f4b8				  -	      endif		; DRIVINGBOOST
  11689  f4b8				  -
  11690  f4b8				  -	      jmp	LLRET1
  11691  f4b8				  -
  11692  f4b8					      endif		; MOUSE1SUPPORT
  11693  f4b8
  11694  f4b8
  11695  f4b8				   trakball0update
  11696  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	TRAKBALL0SUPPORT
  11697  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	TRAKTIME
  11698  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	TRAKXONLY
  11699  f4b8				  -	      lda	#180	; minimum for x+y
  11700  f4b8				  -	      else		; !TRAKXONLY
  11701  f4b8				  -	      lda	#100	; minimum for just x
  11702  f4b8				  -	      endif		; !TRAKXONLY
  11703  f4b8				  -	      else		; !TRAKTIME
  11704  f4b8				  -	      lda	#TRAKTIME
  11705  f4b8				  -	      endif		; !TRAKTIME
  11706  f4b8				  -	      jsr	SETTIM64T	; INTIM is in Y
  11707  f4b8				  -	      ldx	#0
  11708  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	TRAKXONLY
  11709  f4b8				  -	      ldy	#0
  11710  f4b8				  -	      endif		; TRAKXONLY
  11711  f4b8				  -trakball0updateloop
  11712  f4b8				  -	      lda	SWCHA
  11713  f4b8				  -	      and	#%00110000
  11714  f4b8				  -	      cmp	trakballcodex0
  11715  f4b8				  -	      sta	trakballcodex0
  11716  f4b8				  -	      beq	trakball0movementXdone
  11717  f4b8				  -	      and	#%00010000
  11718  f4b8				  -	      beq	trakball0negativeX
  11719  f4b8				  -trakball0positiveX
  11720  f4b8				  -			;(2 from beq)
  11721  f4b8				  -	      inx		; 2
  11722  f4b8				  -	      jmp	trakball0movementXdone	; 3
  11723  f4b8				  -trakball0negativeX
  11724  f4b8				  -			;(3 from beq)
  11725  f4b8				  -	      dex		; 2
  11726  f4b8				  -	      nop		; 2
  11727  f4b8				  -trakball0movementXdone
  11728  f4b8				  -
  11729  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	TRAKXONLY
  11730  f4b8				  -	      lda	SWCHA
  11731  f4b8				  -	      and	#%11000000
  11732  f4b8				  -	      cmp	trakballcodey0
  11733  f4b8				  -	      sta	trakballcodey0
  11734  f4b8				  -	      beq	trakball0movementYdone
  11735  f4b8				  -	      and	#%01000000
  11736  f4b8				  -	      beq	trakball0negativeY
  11737  f4b8				  -trakball0positiveY
  11738  f4b8				  -			;(2 from beq)
  11739  f4b8				  -	      iny		; 2
  11740  f4b8				  -	      jmp	trakball0movementYdone	; 3
  11741  f4b8				  -trakball0negativeY
  11742  f4b8				  -			;(3 from beq)
  11743  f4b8				  -	      dey		; 2
  11744  f4b8				  -	      nop		; 2
  11745  f4b8				  -trakball0movementYdone
  11746  f4b8				  -	      endif		; !TRAKXONLY
  11747  f4b8				  -
  11748  f4b8				  -	      lda	TIMINT
  11749  f4b8				  -	      bpl	trakball0updateloop
  11750  f4b8				  -	      lda	#0
  11751  f4b8				  -	      cpx	#0
  11752  f4b8				  -	      beq	trakball0skipXadjust
  11753  f4b8				  -	      clc

  11756  f4b8				  -	      dex

  11758  f4b8				  -	      clc

  11782  f4b8				   trakball1update
  11783  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	TRAKBALL1SUPPORT
  11784  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	TRAKTIME
  11785  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	TRAKXONLY
  11786  f4b8				  -	      lda	#180	; minimum for x+y
  11787  f4b8				  -	      else		; !TRAKXONLY
  11788  f4b8				  -	      lda	#100	; minimum for just x
  11789  f4b8				  -	      endif		; !TRAKXONLY

  11794  f4b8				  -	      ldx	#0

  11802  f4b8				  -	      sta	trakballcodex1
  11803  f4b8				  -	      beq	trakball1movementXdone
  11804  f4b8				  -	      and	#%00000001
  11805  f4b8				  -	      beq	trakball1negativeX
  11806  f4b8				  -trakball1positiveX
  11807  f4b8				  -			;(2 from beq)
  11808  f4b8				  -	      inx		; 2
  11809  f4b8				  -	      jmp	trakball1movementXdone	; 3
  11810  f4b8				  -trakball1negativeX
  11811  f4b8				  -			;(3 from beq)
  11812  f4b8				  -	      dex		; 2
  11813  f4b8				  -	      nop		; 2
  11814  f4b8				  -trakball1movementXdone
  11815  f4b8				  -
  11816  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	TRAKXONLY
  11817  f4b8				  -	      lda	SWCHA
  11818  f4b8				  -	      and	#%00001100
  11819  f4b8				  -	      cmp	trakballcodey1
  11820  f4b8				  -	      sta	trakballcodey1
  11821  f4b8				  -	      beq	trakball1movementYdone
  11822  f4b8				  -	      and	#%00000100
  11823  f4b8				  -	      beq	trakball1negativeY
  11824  f4b8				  -trakball1positiveY
  11825  f4b8				  -			;(2 from beq)
  11826  f4b8				  -	      iny		; 2
  11827  f4b8				  -	      jmp	trakball1movementYdone	; 3
  11828  f4b8				  -trakball1negativeY
  11829  f4b8				  -			;(3 from beq)
  11830  f4b8				  -	      dey		; 2
  11831  f4b8				  -	      nop		; 2
  11832  f4b8				  -trakball1movementYdone
  11833  f4b8				  -	      endif		; !TRAKXONLY
  11834  f4b8				  -
  11835  f4b8				  -	      lda	TIMINT
  11836  f4b8				  -	      bpl	trakball1updateloop
  11837  f4b8				  -	      lda	#0
  11838  f4b8				  -	      cpx	#0
  11839  f4b8				  -	      beq	trakball1skipXadjust
  11840  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11841  f4b8				  -trakball1Xloop
  11842  f4b8				  -	      adc	port1resolution
  11843  f4b8				  -	      dex
  11844  f4b8				  -	      bne	trakball1Xloop
  11845  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11846  f4b8				  -	      adc	trakballx1
  11847  f4b8				  -	      sta	trakballx1
  11848  f4b8				  -trakball1skipXadjust
  11849  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	TRAKXONLY
  11850  f4b8				  -	      lda	#0
  11851  f4b8				  -	      cpy	#0
  11852  f4b8				  -	      beq	trakball1skipYadjust
  11853  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11854  f4b8				  -trakball1yloop
  11855  f4b8				  -	      adc	port1resolution
  11856  f4b8				  -	      dey
  11857  f4b8				  -	      bne	trakball1yloop
  11858  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11859  f4b8				  -	      adc	trakbally1
  11860  f4b8				  -	      sta	trakbally1
  11861  f4b8				  -trakball1skipYadjust
  11862  f4b8				  -	      endif		; !TRAKXONLY
  11863  f4b8				  -
  11864  f4b8				  -	      jmp	LLRET1
  11865  f4b8					      endif
  11866  f4b8
  11867  f4b8
  11868  f4b8				   paddleport0update
  11869  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	PADDLE0SUPPORT
  11870  f4b8				  -	      lda	#6
  11871  f4b8				  -	      sta	VBLANK	; start charging the paddle caps
  11872  f4b8				  -	      lda	#0	; use PADDLE timing
  11873  f4b8				  -	      jsr	SETTIM64T	; INTIM is in Y
  11874  f4b8				  -
  11875  f4b8				  -paddleport0updateloop
  11876  f4b8				  -	      lda	INPT0
  11877  f4b8				  -	      bmi	skippaddle0setposition
  11878  f4b8				  -	      sty	paddleposition0
  11879  f4b8				  -skippaddle0setposition
  11880  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	TWOPADDLESUPPORT
  11881  f4b8				  -	      lda	INPT1
  11882  f4b8				  -	      bmi	skippaddle1setposition
  11883  f4b8				  -	      sty	paddleposition1
  11884  f4b8				  -skippaddle1setposition
  11885  f4b8				  -	      endif
  11886  f4b8				  -	      ldy	INTIM
  11887  f4b8				  -	      cpy	#TIMEOFFSET
  11888  f4b8				  -	      bcs	paddleport0updateloop
  11889  f4b8				  -
  11890  f4b8				  -	      lda	#%10000110
  11891  f4b8				  -	      sta	VBLANK	; dump paddles to ground... this may not be great for genesis controllers
  11892  f4b8				  -	      sec
  11893  f4b8				  -	      lda	paddleposition0
  11894  f4b8				  -	      sbc	#TIMEOFFSET
  11895  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	PADDLESCALEX2
  11896  f4b8				  -	      asl
  11897  f4b8				  -	      endif
  11898  f4b8				  -
  11899  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	PADDLESMOOTHINGOFF
  11900  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11901  f4b8				  -	      adc	paddleprevious0
  11902  f4b8				  -	      ror
  11903  f4b8				  -	      sta	paddleprevious0
  11904  f4b8				  -	      endif
  11905  f4b8				  -
  11906  f4b8				  -	      sta	paddleposition0
  11907  f4b8				  -
  11908  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	TWOPADDLESUPPORT
  11909  f4b8				  -	      sec
  11910  f4b8				  -	      lda	paddleposition1
  11911  f4b8				  -	      sbc	#TIMEOFFSET
  11912  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	PADDLESCALEX2
  11913  f4b8				  -	      asl
  11914  f4b8				  -	      endif
  11915  f4b8				  -
  11916  f4b8				  -	      ifnconst	PADDLESMOOTHINGOFF
  11917  f4b8				  -	      clc
  11918  f4b8				  -	      adc	paddleprevious1
  11919  f4b8				  -	      ror
  11920  f4b8				  -	      sta	paddleprevious1
  11921  f4b8				  -	      endif
  11922  f4b8				  -	      sta	paddleposition1
  11923  f4b8				  -	      endif		; TWOPADDLESUPPORT
  11924  f4b8				  -
  11925  f4b8				  -	      jmp	LLRET0
  11926  f4b8					      endif
  11927  f4b8
  11928  f4b8				   paddleport1update
  11929  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	PADDLE1SUPPORT
  11930  f4b8				  -	      lda	#6
  11931  f4b8				  -	      sta	VBLANK	; start charging the paddle caps
  11932  f4b8				  -
  11933  f4b8				  -	      lda	#0	; use PADDLE timing
  11934  f4b8				  -	      jsr	SETTIM64T	; INTIM is in Y
  11935  f4b8				  -

  11937  f4b8				  -	      lda	INPT2
  11938  f4b8				  -	      bmi	skippaddle2setposition
  11939  f4b8				  -	      sty	paddleposition2
  11940  f4b8				  -skippaddle2setposition
  11941  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	TWOPADDLESUPPORT

  11944  f4b8				  -	      sty	paddleposition3

  11946  f4b8				  -	      endif
  11947  f4b8				  -	      ldy	INTIM

  11949  f4b8				  -	      bcs	paddleport1updateloop

  11963  f4b8				  -	      ror

  11965  f4b8				  -	      endif

  11968  f4b8				  -

  11973  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	PADDLESCALEX2
  11974  f4b8				  -	      asl
  11975  f4b8				  -	      endif
  11976  f4b8				  -

  11985  f4b8				  -
