  11987  f4b8					      endif
  11988  f4b8
  11989  f4b8
  11990  f4b8				   paddlebuttonhandler		; outside of conditional, for button-handler LUT
  11991  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	PADDLESUPPORT
  11992  f4b8				  -			; x=0|1 for port, rather than paddle #.
  11993  f4b8				  -			; Only the first paddle button will integrate into "joy0fire" testing. If the
  11994  f4b8				  -			; game wants to support 2 paddles, up to the game to instead test the
  11995  f4b8				  -			; joystick right+left directions instead.
  11996  f4b8				  -	      lda	SWCHA	; top of nibble is first paddle button
  11997  f4b8				  -	      cpx	#0	; port 0?
  11998  f4b8				  -	      beq	skippaddleport2shift
  11999  f4b8				  -	      asl		; shift second port to upper nibble
  12000  f4b8				  -	      asl
  12001  f4b8				  -	      asl
  12002  f4b8				  -	      asl
  12003  f4b8				  -skippaddleport2shift
  12004  f4b8				  -	      and	#%11000000
  12005  f4b8				  -	      eor	#%11000000	; invert
  12006  f4b8				  -	      sta	sINPT1,x
  12007  f4b8				  -	      jmp	buttonreadloopreturn
  12008  f4b8					      endif		; PADDLESUPPORT
  12009  f4b8
  12010  f4b8				   mousebuttonhandler		; outside of conditional, for button-handler LUT
  12011  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	MOUSESUPPORT
  12012  f4b8				  -			; stick the mouse buttons in the correct shadow register...
  12013  f4b8				  -	      txa
  12014  f4b8				  -	      asl
  12015  f4b8				  -	      tay		; y=x*2
  12016  f4b8				  -	      lda	INPT4,x
  12017  f4b8				  -	      eor	#%10000000
  12018  f4b8				  -	      lsr
  12019  f4b8				  -	      sta	sINPT1,x
  12020  f4b8				  -
  12021  f4b8				  -	      lda	INPT1,y
  12022  f4b8				  -	      and	#%10000000
  12023  f4b8				  -	      eor	#%10000000
  12024  f4b8				  -	      ora	sINPT1,x
  12025  f4b8				  -	      sta	sINPT1,x
  12026  f4b8				  -	      jmp	buttonreadloopreturn
  12027  f4b8					      endif		; MOUSESUPPORT
  12028  f4b8
  12029  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	KEYPADSUPPORT
  12030  f4b8				  -			; ** select keypad rows 0 to 3 over 4 frames...
  12031  f4b8				  -keypadrowselect
  12032  f4b8				  -	      inc	keypadcounter
  12033  f4b8				  -	      ldy	#0
  12034  f4b8				  -	      lda	port0control
  12035  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#7
  12036  f4b8				  -	      bne	skipport0val
  12037  f4b8				  -	      iny		; y=y+1
  12038  f4b8				  -skipport0val
  12039  f4b8				  -	      lda	port1control
  12040  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#7
  12041  f4b8				  -	      bne	skipport1val
  12042  f4b8				  -	      iny
  12043  f4b8				  -	      iny		; y=y+2
  12044  f4b8				  -skipport1val
  12045  f4b8				  -	      cpy	#0
  12046  f4b8				  -	      beq	exitkeypadrowselect
  12047  f4b8				  -	      lda	keyrowdirectionmask,y
  12048  f4b8				  -	      sta	CTLSWA
  12049  f4b8				  -	      tya
  12050  f4b8				  -	      asl
  12051  f4b8				  -	      asl
  12052  f4b8				  -	      sta	inttemp1
  12053  f4b8				  -	      lda	keypadcounter
  12054  f4b8				  -	      and	#3
  12055  f4b8				  -	      ora	inttemp1
  12056  f4b8				  -	      tax
  12057  f4b8				  -	      lda	keyrowselectvalue,x
  12058  f4b8				  -	      sta	SWCHA
  12059  f4b8				  -exitkeypadrowselect
  12060  f4b8				  -	      rts
  12061  f4b8				  -
  12062  f4b8				  -keyrowdirectionmask
  12063  f4b8				  -	      .byte	#%00000000	; 0 : port0=input port1=input
  12064  f4b8				  -	      .byte	#%11110000	; 1 : port0=output port1=input
  12065  f4b8				  -	      .byte	#%00001111	; 2 : port0=input port1=output
  12066  f4b8				  -	      .byte	#%11111111	; 3 : port0=output port1=output
  12067  f4b8				  -
  12068  f4b8				  -keyrowselectvalue
  12069  f4b8				  -	      .byte	#%00000000, #%00000000, #%00000000, #%00000000	; no row selected, all pins high, always
  12070  f4b8				  -	      .byte	#%11100000, #%11010000, #%10110000, #%01110000	; p0 keypad in
  12071  f4b8				  -	      .byte	#%00001110, #%00001101, #%00001011, #%00000111	; p1 keypad in
  12072  f4b8				  -	      .byte	#%11101110, #%11011101, #%10111011, #%01110111	; p0+p1 keypads in
  12073  f4b8					      endif		; KEYPADSUPPORT
  12074  f4b8
  12075  f4b8				  -	      ifconst	KEYPADSUPPORT
  12076  f4b8				  -			; TODO - split into compile-time KEYPAD0SUPPORT and KEYPAD1SUPPORT
  12077  f4b8				  -keypadcolumnread
  12078  f4b8				  -	      lda	port0control
  12079  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#7
  12080  f4b8				  -	      bne	skipkeypadcolumnread0
  12081  f4b8				  -	      lda	keypadcounter
  12082  f4b8				  -	      and	#3
  12083  f4b8				  -	      asl		; x2 because keypad variables are interleaved
  12084  f4b8				  -	      tax
  12085  f4b8				  -	      lda	#0
  12086  f4b8				  -	      sta	keypadmatrix0a,x
  12087  f4b8				  -	      lda	INPT0
  12088  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#$80
  12089  f4b8				  -	      rol	keypadmatrix0a,x
  12090  f4b8				  -	      lda	INPT1
  12091  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#$80
  12092  f4b8				  -	      rol	keypadmatrix0a,x
  12093  f4b8				  -	      lda	INPT4
  12094  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#$80
  12095  f4b8				  -	      rol	keypadmatrix0a,x
  12096  f4b8				  -	      lda	keypadmatrix0a,x
  12097  f4b8				  -	      eor	#%00000111
  12098  f4b8				  -	      sta	keypadmatrix0a,x
  12099  f4b8				  -skipkeypadcolumnread0
  12100  f4b8				  -
  12101  f4b8				  -	      lda	port1control
  12102  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#7
  12103  f4b8				  -	      bne	skipkeypadcolumnread1
  12104  f4b8				  -	      lda	keypadcounter
  12105  f4b8				  -	      and	#3
  12106  f4b8				  -	      asl		; x2 because keypad variables are interleaved
  12107  f4b8				  -	      tax
  12108  f4b8				  -	      lda	#0
  12109  f4b8				  -	      sta	keypadmatrix1a,x
  12110  f4b8				  -	      rol	keypadmatrix1a,x
  12111  f4b8				  -	      lda	INPT2
  12112  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#$80
  12113  f4b8				  -	      rol	keypadmatrix1a,x
  12114  f4b8				  -	      lda	INPT3
  12115  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#$80
  12116  f4b8				  -	      rol	keypadmatrix1a,x
  12117  f4b8				  -	      lda	INPT5
  12118  f4b8				  -	      cmp	#$80
  12119  f4b8				  -	      rol	keypadmatrix1a,x
  12120  f4b8				  -	      lda	keypadmatrix1a,x
  12121  f4b8				  -	      eor	#%00000111
  12122  f4b8				  -	      sta	keypadmatrix1a,x
  12123  f4b8				  -skipkeypadcolumnread1
  12124  f4b8				  -	      rts
  12125  f4b8					      endif		; KEYPADSUPPORT
  12126  f4b8
  12127  f4b8				   setportforinput
  12128  f4b8		       ad 81 02 	      lda	CTLSWA
  12129  f4bb		       3d c2 f1 	      and	SWCHA_DIRMASK,x
  12130  f4be		       8d 81 02 	      sta	CTLSWA
  12131  f4c1		       60		      rts
  12132  f4c2
  12133  f4c2				   setonebuttonmode
  12134  f4c2		       a9 06		      lda	#6	; in case we're in unlocked-bios mode
  12135  f4c4		       85 01		      sta	VBLANK	; if we were on paddles, the line is grounded out.
  12136  f4c6		       a9 14		      lda	#$14
  12137  f4c8		       8d 83 02 	      sta	CTLSWB
  12138  f4cb		       ad 82 02 	      lda	SWCHB
  12139  f4ce		       1d e8 f4 	      ora	thisjoy2buttonbit,x	; disable: write 1 to the 2-button bit
  12140  f4d1		       8d 82 02 	      sta	SWCHB
  12141  f4d4		       60		      rts
  12142  f4d5
  12143  f4d5				   settwobuttonmode
  12144  f4d5		       a9 06		      lda	#6	; in case we're in unlocked-bios mode
  12145  f4d7		       85 01		      sta	VBLANK	; if we were on paddles, the line is grounded out.
  12146  f4d9		       a9 14		      lda	#$14
  12147  f4db		       8d 83 02 	      sta	CTLSWB
  12148  f4de		       ad 82 02 	      lda	SWCHB
  12149  f4e1		       3d e9 f4 	      and	thisjoy2buttonbit+1,x	; enable: write 0 to the 2-button bit
  12150  f4e4		       8d 82 02 	      sta	SWCHB
  12151  f4e7		       60		      rts
  12152  f4e8
  12153  f4e8				   thisjoy2buttonbit
  12154  f4e8							; p0	p1   p0
  12155  f4e8		       04 10 04 	      .byte.b	$04, $10, $04
  12156  f4eb
  12157  f4eb				  -	      ifconst	CHANGEDMAHOLES
  12158  f4eb				  -removedmaholes
  12159  f4eb				  -	      ldx	#0
  12160  f4eb				  -removedllholesloop
  12161  f4eb				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
  12162  f4eb				  -	      and	#%10001111
  12163  f4eb				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
  12164  f4eb				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  12165  f4eb				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
  12166  f4eb				  -	      endif
  12167  f4eb				  -	      inx
  12168  f4eb				  -	      inx
  12169  f4eb				  -	      inx
  12170  f4eb				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  12171  f4eb				  -	      cpx	#DBOFFSET
  12172  f4eb				  -	      bcc	removedllholesloop
  12173  f4eb				  -	      else
  12174  f4eb				  -	      bpl	removedllholesloop
  12175  f4eb				  -	      endif
  12176  f4eb				  -	      rts
  12177  f4eb				  -
  12178  f4eb				  -createdmaholes
  12179  f4eb				  -	      ldx	#0
  12180  f4eb				  -createdllholesloop
  12181  f4eb				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
  12182  f4eb				  -	      ora	#(WZONEHEIGHT*4)
  12183  f4eb				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
  12184  f4eb				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  12185  f4eb				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
  12186  f4eb				  -	      endif
  12187  f4eb				  -	      inx
  12188  f4eb				  -	      inx
  12189  f4eb				  -	      inx
  12190  f4eb				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  12191  f4eb				  -	      cpx	#DBOFFSET
  12192  f4eb				  -	      bcc	createdllholesloop
  12193  f4eb				  -	      else
  12194  f4eb				  -	      bpl	createdllholesloop
  12195  f4eb				  -	      endif
  12196  f4eb				  -	      rts
  12197  f4eb					      endif

  12203  f4eb
  12204  f4eb							;******** more or less the Atari recommended startup procedure
  12205  f4eb
  12206  f4eb		       78		      sei
  12207  f4ec		       d8		      cld
  12208  f4ed
  12209  f4ed					      ifnconst	NOTIALOCK
  12210  f4ed		       a9 07		      lda	#$07
  12211  f4ef				  -	      else
  12212  f4ef				  -	      lda	#$06
  12213  f4ef					      endif
  12214  f4ef		       85 01		      sta	INPTCTRL	;lock 7800 into 7800 mode
  12215  f4f1		       a9 7f		      lda	#$7F
  12216  f4f3		       85 3c		      sta	CTRL	;disable DMA
  12217  f4f5		       a9 00		      lda	#$00
  12218  f4f7		       85 38		      sta	OFFSET
  12219  f4f9					      ifnconst	NOTIALOCK
  12220  f4f9		       85 01		      sta	INPTCTRL
  12221  f4fb		       85 20		      sta	BACKGRND	; black default, in case a flash cart is using something else
  12222  f4fd					      endif
  12223  f4fd		       a2 ff		      ldx	#$FF
  12224  f4ff		       9a		      txs
  12225  f500
  12226  f500							;************** Clear Memory
  12227  f500
  12228  f500							; ** Clear 1800-27FF, pg0+pg1 memory.
  12229  f500				   ClearMemPages
  12230  f500		       a9 00		      lda	#0
  12231  f502		       a8		      tay		; y=0
  12232  f503		       85 80		      sta	$80
  12233  f505		       a2 18		      ldx	#$18
  12234  f507				   ClearMemPagesLoop
  12235  f507		       86 81		      stx	$81	; needed for when we step on ZP memory
  12236  f509		       91 80		      sta	($80),y	;Store data
  12237  f50b		       c8		      iny		;Next byte
  12238  f50c		       d0 f9		      bne	ClearMemPagesLoop
  12239  f50e		       e8		      inx
  12240  f50f		       e0 28		      cpx	#$28
  12241  f511		       d0 f4		      bne	ClearMemPagesLoop
  12242  f513		       85 81		      sta	$81
  12243  f515
  12244  f515							;seed random number with hopefully-random timer value
  12245  f515		       a9 01		      lda	#1
  12246  f517		       0d 84 02 	      ora	INTIM
  12247  f51a		       85 40		      sta	rand
  12248  f51c
  12249  f51c							; detect the console type...
  12250  f51c				   pndetectvblankstart
  12251  f51c		       a5 28		      lda	MSTAT
  12252  f51e		       10 fc		      bpl	pndetectvblankstart	; if we're not in VBLANK, wait for it to start
  12253  f520				   pndetectvblankover
  12254  f520		       a5 28		      lda	MSTAT
  12255  f522		       30 fc		      bmi	pndetectvblankover	; then wait for it to be over
  12256  f524		       a0 00		      ldy	#$00
  12257  f526		       a2 00		      ldx	#$00
  12258  f528				   pndetectvblankhappening
  12259  f528		       a5 28		      lda	MSTAT
  12260  f52a		       30 07		      bmi	pndetectinvblank	; if VBLANK starts, exit our counting loop
  12261  f52c		       85 24		      sta	WSYNC
  12262  f52e		       85 24		      sta	WSYNC
  12263  f530		       e8		      inx
  12264  f531		       d0 f5		      bne	pndetectvblankhappening
  12265  f533				   pndetectinvblank
  12266  f533		       e0 7d		      cpx	#125
  12267  f535		       90 02		      bcc	pndetecispal
  12268  f537		       a0 01		      ldy	#$01
  12269  f539				   pndetecispal
  12270  f539		       8c 09 21 	      sty	paldetected
  12271  f53c
  12272  f53c		       20 4c f4 	      jsr	createallgamedlls
  12273  f53f
  12274  f53f		       a9 18		      lda	#>DLLMEM
  12275  f541		       85 2c		      sta	DPPH
  12276  f543		       a9 00		      lda	#<DLLMEM
  12277  f545		       85 30		      sta	DPPL
  12278  f547
  12279  f547				  -	      ifconst	pokeysupport
  12280  f547				  -			; pokey support is compiled in, so try to detect it...
  12281  f547				  -	      jsr	detectpokeylocation
  12282  f547					      endif
  12283  f547
  12284  f547		       a9 01		      lda	#1	; default for port 0 and 1 is a regular joystick
  12285  f549		       8d b8 01 	      sta	port0control
  12286  f54c		       8d b9 01 	      sta	port1control
  12287  f54f
  12288  f54f							;Setup port A to read mode
  12289  f54f							;lda #$00
  12290  f54f							;sta SWCHA
  12291  f54f							;sta CTLSWA
  12292  f54f
  12293  f54f				  -	      ifconst	HSSUPPORT
  12294  f54f				  -	      ifconst	bankswitchmode
  12295  f54f				  -	      ifconst	included.hiscore.asm.bank
  12296  f54f				  -	      ifconst	MCPDEVCART
  12297  f54f				  -	      lda	#($18 | included.hiscore.asm.bank)
  12298  f54f				  -	      ifconst	dumpbankswitch
  12299  f54f				  -	      sta	dumpbankswitch
  12300  f54f				  -	      endif
  12301  f54f				  -	      sta	$3000
  12302  f54f				  -	      else
  12303  f54f				  -	      lda	#(included.hiscore.asm.bank)
  12304  f54f				  -	      ifconst	dumpbankswitch
  12305  f54f				  -	      sta	dumpbankswitch
  12306  f54f				  -	      endif
  12307  f54f				  -	      sta	$8000
  12308  f54f				  -	      endif
  12309  f54f				  -	      endif		; included.hiscore.asm.bank
  12310  f54f				  -	      endif		; bankswitchmode
  12311  f54f				  -			; try to detect HSC
  12312  f54f				  -	      jsr	detecthsc
  12313  f54f				  -	      and	#1
  12314  f54f				  -	      sta	hsdevice
  12315  f54f				  -skipHSCdetect
  12316  f54f				  -			; try to detect AtariVox eeprom
  12317  f54f				  -	      jsr	detectatarivoxeeprom
  12318  f54f				  -	      and	#2
  12319  f54f				  -	      ora	hsdevice
  12320  f54f				  -	      cmp	#3
  12321  f54f				  -	      bne	storeAinhsdevice
  12322  f54f				  -			; For now, we tie break by giving HSC priority over AtariVox.
  12323  f54f				  -			; Later we should check each device's priority byte if set, instead,
  12324  f54f				  -	      lda	#2
  12325  f54f				  -storeAinhsdevice
  12326  f54f				  -	      sta	hsdevice
  12327  f54f				  -	      lda	#$ff
  12328  f54f				  -	      sta	hsdifficulty
  12329  f54f				  -	      sta	hsgameslot
  12330  f54f				  -	      sta	hsnewscoreline
  12331  f54f					      endif		; HSSUPPORT
  12332  f54f
  12333  f54f				  -	      ifconst	AVOXVOICE
  12334  f54f				  -	      jsr	silenceavoxvoice
  12335  f54f					      endif
  12336  f54f
  12337  f54f				  -	      ifconst	MULTIBUTTON
  12338  f54f				  -	      ifnconst	HSSUPPORT
  12339  f54f				  -min_detectatarivoxeeprom
  12340  f54f				  -	      jsr	i2c_startwrite
  12341  f54f				  -	      bcc	min_no_eeprom_error
  12342  f54f				  -	      lda	#$ff
  12343  f54f				  -	      jmp	min_avoxdetect_done
  12344  f54f				  -min_no_eeprom_error
  12345  f54f				  -	      lda	#$30
  12346  f54f				  -	      jsr	i2c_txbyte
  12347  f54f				  -	      lda	#$00
  12348  f54f				  -	      jsr	i2c_txbyte
  12349  f54f				  -	      jsr	i2c_stopwrite
  12350  f54f				  -min_avoxdetect_done
  12351  f54f				  -	      eor	#$FF
  12352  f54f				  -	      sta	avoxdetected
  12353  f54f				  -	      jmp	min_detectatarivoxeepromdone
  12354  f54f				  -	      include	"i2c7800.inc"
  12355  f54f				  -	      I2C_SUBS	temp9
  12356  f54f				  -min_detectatarivoxeepromdone
  12357  f54f				  -	      endif		; HSSUPPORT
  12358  f54f					      endif		; MULTIBUTTON
  12359  f54f
  12360  f54f				  -	      ifconst	MULTIBUTTON
  12361  f54f				  -	      lda	avoxdetected
  12362  f54f				  -	      beq	skipassignavox
  12363  f54f				  -	      lda	#10
  12364  f54f				  -	      sta	port1control	; designate port 1 as atarivox so multibutton won't disturb it.
  12365  f54f				  -skipassignavox
  12366  f54f					      endif		; MULTIBUTTON
  12367  f54f
  12368  f54f				  -	      ifconst	RMT
  12369  f54f				  -	      ifconst	RMTVOLUME
  12370  f54f				  -	      lda	#$F0	; default to full RMT volume
  12371  f54f				  -	      sta	rmtvolume
  12372  f54f				  -	      ifconst	TIAVOLUME
  12373  f54f				  -	      sta	tiavolume
  12374  f54f				  -	      endif		; TIAVOLUME
  12375  f54f				  -	      endif		; RMTVOLUME
  12376  f54f					      else		; !RMT
  12377  f54f				  -	      ifconst	TIAVOLUME
  12378  f54f				  -	      lda	#$F0	; default to full TIA volume
  12379  f54f				  -	      sta	tiavolume
  12380  f54f					      endif		; TIAVOLUME
  12381  f54f					      endif		; RMT
  12382  f54f
  12383  f54f				  -	      ifconst	bankswitchmode
  12384  f54f				  -			; we need to switch to the first bank as a default. this needs to
  12385  f54f				  -			; happen before DMA, in case there's a topscreenroutine in bank 0
  12386  f54f				  -	      ifconst	MCPDEVCART
  12387  f54f				  -	      lda	#$18	; xxx11nnn - switch to bank 0
  12388  f54f				  -	      ifconst	dumpbankswitch
  12389  f54f				  -	      sta	dumpbankswitch
  12390  f54f				  -	      endif
  12391  f54f				  -	      sta	$3000
  12392  f54f				  -	      else
  12393  f54f				  -	      lda	#0
  12394  f54f				  -	      ifconst	dumpbankswitch
  12395  f54f				  -	      sta	dumpbankswitch
  12396  f54f				  -	      endif
  12397  f54f				  -	      sta	$8000
  12398  f54f				  -	      endif
  12399  f54f					      endif
  12400  f54f
  12401  f54f							; CTRL 76543210
  12402  f54f							; 7 colorburst kill
  12403  f54f							; 6,5 dma ctrl 2=normal DMA, 3=no DMA
  12404  f54f							; 4 character width 1=2 byte chars, 0=1 byte chars
  12405  f54f							; 3 border control 0=background color border, 1=black border
  12406  f54f							; 2 kangaroo mode 0=transparency, 1=kangaroo
  12407  f54f							; 1,0 read mode 0=160x2/160x4 1=N/A 2=320B/320D 3=320A/320C
  12408  f54f
  12409  f54f					      ifconst	DOUBLEWIDE
  12410  f54f		       a9 50		      lda	#%01010000	;Enable DMA, mode=160x2/160x4, 2x character width
  12411  f551				  -	      else
  12412  f551				  -	      lda	#%01000000	;Enable DMA, mode=160x2/160x4
  12413  f551					      endif
  12414  f551
  12415  f551		       20 af f4 	      jsr	waitforvblankstart	; give the some vblank time to minimally update the display
  12416  f554
  12417  f554		       85 3c		      sta	CTRL
  12418  f556		       8d 07 21 	      sta	sCTRL
  12419  f559
  12420  f559		       20 3f f4 	      jsr	vblankresync
  12421  f55c
  12422  f55c		       a2 01		      ldx	#1
  12423  f55e		       20 d5 f4 	      jsr	settwobuttonmode
  12424  f561		       a2 00		      ldx	#0
  12425  f563		       20 d5 f4 	      jsr	settwobuttonmode
  12426  f566
  12427  f566					      ifnconst	.altgamestart
  12428  f566		       4c 00 80 	      jmp	game
  12429  f569				  -	      else
  12430  f569				  -	      jmp	.altgamestart
  12431  f569					      endif
  12432  f569
  12433  f569							; Provided under the CC0 license. See the included LICENSE.txt for details.
  12434  f569
  12435  f569							; A tunable parameter, to claim some memory back from DL usage
  12436  f569		       00 00	   MEMSKIP    =	$00
  12437  f569
  12438  f569							;************** Setup DLL entries
  12439  f569
  12440  f569							; setup some working definitions, to avoid ifnconst mess elsewhere...
  12441  f569					      ifnconst	SCREENHEIGHT
  12442  f569		       00 c0	   WSCREENHEIGHT =	192
  12443  f569				  -	      else
  12444  f569				  -WSCREENHEIGHT =	SCREENHEIGHT
  12445  f569					      endif
  12446  f569
  12447  f569					      ifnconst	ZONEHEIGHT
  12448  f569		       00 10	   WZONEHEIGHT =	16
  12449  f569				  -	      else
  12450  f569				  -WZONEHEIGHT =	ZONEHEIGHT
  12451  f569					      endif
  12452  f569
  12453  f569					      ifnconst	ZONECOUNT
  12454  f569				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
  12455  f569				  -WZONECOUNT =	((WSCREENHEIGHT/WZONEHEIGHT)+1)
  12456  f569					      else		; !VSCROLL
  12457  f569		       00 0c	   WZONECOUNT =	(WSCREENHEIGHT/WZONEHEIGHT)
  12458  f569					      endif		; !VSCROLL
  12459  f569				  -	      else
  12460  f569				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
  12461  f569				  -WZONECOUNT =	(ZONECOUNT+1)
  12462  f569				  -	      else		; !VSCROLL
  12463  f569				  -WZONECOUNT =	ZONECOUNT
  12464  f569				  -	      endif		; !VSCROLL
  12465  f569					      endif
  12466  f569
  12467  f569							; top of the frame, non-visible lines. this is based on NTSC,
  12468  f569							; but we add in extra NV lines at the end of the display to ensure
  12469  f569							; our PAL friends can play the game without it crashing.
  12470  f569		       00 19	   NVLINES    =	((243-WSCREENHEIGHT)/2)
  12471  f569
  12472  f569					      ifnconst	DLMEMSTART
  12473  f569					      ifnconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  12474  f569				   WDLMEMSTART SET	$1880
  12475  f569				  -	      else
  12476  f569				  -WDLMEMSTART SET	$18E0
  12477  f569					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  12478  f569				  -	      else
  12479  f569				  -WDLMEMSTART SET	DLMEMSTART
  12480  f569					      endif
  12481  f569
  12482  f569				  -	      if	MEMSKIP > 0
  12483  f569				  -	      echo	"   ",[WDLMEMSTART],"to",[WDLMEMSTART+MEMSKIP-1],"was freed for game usage with MEMSKIP."
  12484  f569				  -WDLMEMSTART SET	(WDLMEMSTART + MEMSKIP)
  12485  f569					      endif		; MEMSKIP > 0
  12486  f569
  12487  f569					      ifnconst	DLMEMEND
  12488  f569				  -	      ifconst	EXTRADLMEMORY
  12489  f569				  -WDLMEMEND  =	$23FF
  12490  f569					      else
  12491  f569		       1f ff	   WDLMEMEND  =	$1FFF
  12492  f569					      endif
  12493  f569				  -	      else
  12494  f569				  -WDLMEMEND  =	DLMEMEND
  12495  f569					      endif
  12496  f569
  12497  f569
  12498  f569				   WMEMSIZE   SET	(WDLMEMEND-WDLMEMSTART+1)
  12499  f569
  12500  f569				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
  12501  f569				  -	      ifnconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  12502  f569				  -			; give the last zone extra ram for the dma mask objects...
  12503  f569				  -WMEMSIZE   SET	(WMEMSIZE-(maskscrollspriteend-maskscrollsprite))
  12504  f569				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
  12505  f569					      endif		; VSCROLL
  12506  f569
  12507  f569					      ifnconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
  12508  f569		       00 9b	   DLLASTOBJ  =	((((WMEMSIZE/WZONECOUNT)-2)/5)*5)	; -2 to always ensure we have 1x double-byte terminator
  12509  f569				  -	      else
  12510  f569				  -DLLASTOBJ  =	((((WMEMSIZE/WZONECOUNT)-4)/10)*5)	; -4 to always ensure we have 2x double-byte terminators
  12511  f569					      endif
  12512  f569
  12513  f569		       00 9d	   TDOUBLEBUFFEROFFSET =	(DLLASTOBJ+2)	; offset between DL buffers. ie. half the real DL
  12514  f569				  -	      if	TDOUBLEBUFFEROFFSET > 255
  12515  f569				  -DOUBLEBUFFEROFFSET =	255
  12516  f569					      else
  12517  f569		       00 9d	   DOUBLEBUFFEROFFSET =	(DLLASTOBJ+2)
  12518  f569					      endif
  12519  f569
  12520  f569				  -	      ifconst	EXTRADLMEMORY
  12521  f569				  -SECONDDLHALFSTART SET	$2300
  12522  f569					      endif
  12523  f569
  12524  f569				   DLPOINTH
  12525  f569				   DLINDEX    SET	0
  12526  f569					      REPEAT	WZONECOUNT
  12527  f569				   TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(((DLINDEX*WMEMSIZE)/WZONECOUNT)+WDLMEMSTART)
  12528  f569				  -	      ifconst	EXTRADLMEMORY
  12529  f569				  -	      if	TMPMEMADDRESS > $1FFF
  12530  f569				  -TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(TMPMEMADDRESS + $300)
  12531  f569				  -	      else
  12532  f569				  -	      if	((((DLINDEX+1)*WMEMSIZE)/WZONECOUNT)+WDLMEMSTART) > $1FFF
  12533  f569				  -TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(TMPMEMADDRESS + $300)
  12534  f569				  -SECONDDLHALFSTART SET	TMPMEMADDRESS
  12535  f569				  -	      endif
  12536  f569				  -	      endif		; TMPMEMADDRESS > $1FFF
  12537  f569					      endif		; EXTRADLMEMORY
  12538  f569							;echo " "," ZONE",[DLINDEX]d,"ADDRESS: ",TMPMEMADDRESS
  12539  f569		       18		      .byte.b	>TMPMEMADDRESS
  12540  f569				   DLINDEX    SET	DLINDEX + 1
  12526  f569					      REPEND
  12527  f569				   TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(((DLINDEX*WMEMSIZE)/WZONECOUNT)+WDLMEMSTART)
  12528  f56a				  -	      ifconst	EXTRADLMEMORY
  12529  f56a				  -	      if	TMPMEMADDRESS > $1FFF
  12530  f56a				  -TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(TMPMEMADDRESS + $300)
  12531  f56a				  -	      else

  12533  f56a				  -TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(TMPMEMADDRESS + $300)
  12534  f56a				  -SECONDDLHALFSTART SET	TMPMEMADDRESS
  12535  f56a				  -	      endif

  12537  f56a					      endif		; EXTRADLMEMORY
  12538  f56a							;echo " "," ZONE",[DLINDEX]d,"ADDRESS: ",TMPMEMADDRESS
  12539  f56a		       19		      .byte.b	>TMPMEMADDRESS
  12540  f56a				   DLINDEX    SET	DLINDEX + 1
  12526  f56a					      REPEND

  12534  f56b				  -SECONDDLHALFSTART SET	TMPMEMADDRESS
  12535  f56b				  -	      endif
  12536  f56b				  -	      endif		; TMPMEMADDRESS > $1FFF
  12537  f56b					      endif		; EXTRADLMEMORY
  12538  f56b							;echo " "," ZONE",[DLINDEX]d,"ADDRESS: ",TMPMEMADDRESS
  12539  f56b		       19		      .byte.b	>TMPMEMADDRESS
  12540  f56b				   DLINDEX    SET	DLINDEX + 1
  12526  f56b					      REPEND

  12528  f56c				  -	      ifconst	EXTRADLMEMORY

  12530  f56c				  -TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(TMPMEMADDRESS + $300)
  12531  f56c				  -	      else

  12533  f56c				  -TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(TMPMEMADDRESS + $300)
  12534  f56c				  -SECONDDLHALFSTART SET	TMPMEMADDRESS
  12535  f56c				  -	      endif
  12536  f56c				  -	      endif		; TMPMEMADDRESS > $1FFF
  12537  f56c					      endif		; EXTRADLMEMORY
  12538  f56c							;echo " "," ZONE",[DLINDEX]d,"ADDRESS: ",TMPMEMADDRESS
  12539  f56c		       1a		      .byte.b	>TMPMEMADDRESS
  12540  f56c				   DLINDEX    SET	DLINDEX + 1
  12526  f56c					      REPEND
  12527  f56c				   TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(((DLINDEX*WMEMSIZE)/WZONECOUNT)+WDLMEMSTART)
  12528  f56d				  -	      ifconst	EXTRADLMEMORY
  12529  f56d				  -	      if	TMPMEMADDRESS > $1FFF
  12530  f56d				  -TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(TMPMEMADDRESS + $300)
  12531  f56d				  -	      else
  12532  f56d				  -	      if	((((DLINDEX+1)*WMEMSIZE)/WZONECOUNT)+WDLMEMSTART) > $1FFF
  12533  f56d				  -TMPMEMADDRESS SET	(TMPMEMADDRESS + $300)
  12534  f56d				  -SECONDDLHALFSTART SET	TMPMEMADDRESS
  12535  f56d				  -	      endif
  12536  f56d				  -	      endif		; TMPMEMADDRESS > $1FFF
  12537  f56d					      endif		; EXTRADLMEMORY

  12593  f58d							; Provided under the CC0 license. See the included LICENSE.txt for details.
  12594  f58d
  12595  f58d							; a simple guard, than ensures the 7800basic code hasn't
  12596  f58d							; spilled into the encryption area...
     2545 bytes left in the 7800basic reserved area.
  12597  f58d					      echo	"   ",($FF7E-*)d,"bytes left in the 7800basic reserved area."
  12598  f58d				  -	      if	(*>$FF7D)
  12599  f58d				  -	      echo
  12600  f58d				  -	      echo	"***************************"
  12601  f58d				  -	      echo	"*** Abort: ROM Overflow ***"
  12602  f58d				  -	      echo	"***************************"
  12603  f58d				  -	      ERR		; abort the assembly
  12604  f58d					      endif
  12605  f58d
  12606  f58d							; throw a compile
  12607  f58d				  -	      ifconst	RMT
  12608  f58d				  -	      ifnconst	pokeysupport
  12609  f58d				  -	      echo
  12610  f58d				  -	      echo	"************************************************************"
  12611  f58d				  -	      echo	"*** ABORT: RMT Tracker requires 'set pokeysupport $xxxx' ***"
  12612  f58d				  -	      echo	"************************************************************"
  12613  f58d				  -	      ERR		; abort
  12614  f58d				  -	      endif		; pokeysupport
  12615  f58d				  -	      ifnconst	pokeyaddress
  12616  f58d				  -	      echo
  12617  f58d				  -	      echo	"************************************************************"
  12618  f58d				  -	      echo	"*** ABORT: RMT Tracker requires 'set pokeysupport $xxxx' ***"
  12619  f58d				  -	      echo	"************************************************************"
  12620  f58d				  -	      ERR		; abort
  12621  f58d				  -	      endif		; pokeyaddress
  12622  f58d					      endif

  12640  f58d					      endif

  12642  f58d
  12643  f58d							; FF7E/FF7F contains the 7800basic crc checksum word
  12644  f58d
  12645  f58d							; FF80 - FFF7 contains the 7800 encryption key
  12646  f58d
  12647  f58d					      ifnconst	bankswitchmode
  12648  fff8					      ORG	$FFF8
  12649  fff8				  -	      else
  12650  fff8				  -	      ifconst	ROM128K
  12651  fff8				  -	      ORG	$27FF8
  12652  fff8				  -	      RORG	$FFF8
  12653  fff8				  -	      endif
  12654  fff8				  -	      ifconst	ROM144K

  12675  fff8
  12676  fff8
  12677  fff8		       ff		      .byte.b	$FF	; region verification. $FF=all regions
  12678  fff9		       f7		      .byte.b	$F7	; high nibble:  encryption check from $N000 to $FF7F. we only hash the last 4k for faster boot.
  12679  fffa							; low nibble :  N=7 atari rainbow start, N=3 no atari rainbow
  12680  fffa
  12681  fffa							;Vectors
  12682  fffa		       00 f0		      .word.w	NMI
  12683  fffc		       eb f4		      .word.w	START
  12684  fffe		       5f f0		      .word.w	IRQ
